They possessed a decent level of archery and martial arts.{nl}The doubts which Ruklys had in his mind also disappeared.{nl}It was certain that they were not normal thieves...{nl}Ruklys held his sword on his other hand.{nl}He noticed something strange as the time passed by, but that was after many people died.{nl}In the darkness, the battle continued.{nl}Ruklys managed to win the battle at the end, but he felt somewhat uncomfortable.{nl}Long after the battle, he found out that the village was the hometown of Lydia Schaffen.
The betrayed never forget.{nl}
The things I've forgotten have returned to me, but don't worry.{nl}In my journey, you are a companion.
Please return my soul stone to me.{nl}I'll prepare to summon my subordinates.{nl}
Let's defeat the leader together.{nl}The shadow essences you've collected revealed that he's hidden in Fiskavi Plains.
Pull him out!{nl}I will be with you soon.
If you are afraid, you can give up. I will complete my revenge alone.{nl}I just hope my contractor won't be hurt again...
Thanks for fighting with me, companion.{nl}I will be with you whenever you and your colleagues fall to despair and peril.
Agatas carried out the contract diligently.{nl}I'll leave him and start my journey for revenge.{nl}
The pieces of my spirit have been spread all over this world...{nl}I will reunite with them someday.
If you meet them on your journey, please help them.{nl}My spirits will rely on you.
This is the reward for the contract I've made with Agatas.{nl}Please put this in his pocket.{nl}
Farewell, companion.{nl}I will never forget you.
I'll look for the whereabouts of my other spirits here.{nl}Companion, we will meet again.
I've put the spirit separation potion{nl}into my pocket.
Oh, you're here. {nl}Let's trace back what was seen in the soul's memory. {nl}If we could revive the Ruklys' device, then it will guide us to the revelation.
I know where the device of Ruklys is but we need its parts to fix it. {nl}I will check on the left side so you check on the right.
We'll need the parts to repair the device. {nl}Look for it on the right side.
You're here? {nl}What did Eminent say? {nl}
Good thing he doesn't seem to find anything suspicious. {nl}We must not give any parts to Eminent until the magic circle of Ruklys is activated.
I figured the location of the magic circle as written in the document. {nl}
First, the magic circle under Slepti Watchtower. {nl}The writings on the pole were erased so the magic circle is not working. {nl}
It will work when you write on it again. {nl}I'll take care of the magic circle below so I'll leave this to you.
Be sure not to be caught by Eminent.
I saw the magic circles activate. Are you alright? {nl}What about Eminent? {nl}
You defeated Eminent and obtained the revelation? {nl}Wow, you're way better than I thought... {nl}
Anyway, I also feel like I've helped bring peace to the world and it beats my heart. {nl}But I still have some work to do. You know, right?
I feel lucky to have met you among the many Revelators. {nl}You saved the world, right?
I hope you stay safe, more than anything. {nl}May the goddess bless you!
Uh... Is that an army note? {nl}
Right. Those belong to my colleagues. {nl}I don't know when it would be, but I want to send their keepsakes back to their hometown someday.
Speaking of which, could you give me that army note?
Hopefully, I will be able to return to hometown together with the keepsakes of my colleagues. {nl}And my colleagues would surely want that too.
I will surely bring it back to hometown. {nl}My fellows will want that too.
Come to think of it, there is a holy relic of the goddess in Sielvar Prayer Room. {nl}I think offering a prayer to that holy relic will give us some answers. {nl}
The dead that wakes up again are the problem. {nl}Why don't we purify them and keep them from waking up. {nl}
We break their coffin before they wake up. {nl}Even for the dead ones, it will be better than forcibly waking up. {nl}What do you think? Will you help?
You must be careful not to open the coffin lid when you break the coffin. {nl}When the coffin opens, the dead will jump out and attack.
Good work. {nl}I'm sure they will also thank you for making them rest in peace. {nl}
The problem is that holy relic. {nl}I can't approach anywhere near it because of the barrier.
Maybe the grave keeper would know something about the holy relic and the barrier...{nl}But the grave keeper doesn't like me. We had a thing in the past. {nl}
I met the grave keeper while working on purifying in the name of the goddess. {nl}I was actually helping the grave keeper but he was really mad about it. {nl}
The grave keeper stands at the end of Vepavi Corridor. {nl}Can you ask him about the holy relic of the goddess for me?
A holy relic of the goddess? {nl}What? Are you teaming up with that rude Bokor? {nl}
Get out of this grave site. {nl}Just thinking about that Bokor brings back my anger. {nl}
That Bokor went around breaking the coffins of the dead saying they rise back! {nl}I don't understand how she can do such a thing with a sane mind!
A holy relic that you can't even approach... {nl}I understand if they block the monsters or demons from getting close to it but even humans, that I don't understand.
These people from the Order of the Tree of Truth or whatever were here first before Bokor Utara.{nl}They claimed that they were officially acknowledged by Goddess Zemyna or something?{nl}
They said they'd carry out the will of Goddess Zemyna since this land was blessed by her. {nl}How could I have stopped that.{nl}
But since their arrival, the dead started to rise again. {nl}If that was on purpose, there couldn't have been an insult worse than that! {nl}
That was giving me a headache already, and then some Bokor comes along breaking the coffins. {nl}Breaking the coffins to purify the dead does not show any respect for the dead!
That is not important. {nl}I want to calm all this fuss as soon as possible. {nl}
If you help me, then I will believe that the Bokor didn't come here with bad intentions. {nl}
Burying it back in the ground is not all. {nl}Pay respect to the dead using this match and cremate their bodies.
What are you waiting for! Move quickly! {nl}I cannot... handle it anymore.

Sorry for being sharp a while ago. I was a bit sensitive. {nl}Actually, having to point the blades to people whom I should {nl}take care of as a grave keeper is not something I am comfortable with. {nl}
Thank you for giving them peace for me.
Anyway, I know of the holy relic of the goddess that the Bokor mentioned.{nl}Those people from the Order of the Tree of Truth made it one day. {nl}
Maybe that is why the dead rose... {nl}I had my suspicions but I couldn't approach it either. {nl}
Ah! That's right. {nl}A long time ago, a Bokor and a Necromancer not in their sane minds used to come here secretly. {nl}They used to do insane experiments on the dead who are rested in here. {nl}

So my father learned how to make spell dolls from the guards nearby Klaipeda. {nl}He said if you put spells on the spell dolls, it finds the power {nl}that messes with the grave and destroys it or something? {nl}
There is a chest in Kansias Stone Chamber with my father's belongings. {nl}There should be a spell doll in it. I don't think I can... make it through the bodies.
Our family has been grave keepers for generations. {nl}My father passed away during the disaster on Medzio Diena, so I have taken his place since then. {nl}
I only learned over his shoulders... {nl}But I am the grave keeper of this place now.
Right! This is it.{nl}It wasn't used for a long time, but it should work well since father made it.
Done. Now go to the holy relic. {nl}If that holy relic is the reason behind the dead rising here, {nl}the spell doll will break the barrier and destroy the holy relic.
It's the spell doll that father used. {nl}If we do as my father used to do, then nothing will go wrong. Just as my father used to do...
If the spell doll attacked the holy relic, then it means it detected the evil energy. {nl}But the spell doll was the one destroyed... {nl}
Anyway, if the barrier broke, then your Bokor friend must be able to identify it. {nl}What about going back to that Bokor and asking her?
Huh? You really broke the barrier? {nl}See, I knew the grave keeper would help. {nl}
Actually, I was a bit suspicious myself. {nl}I felt a bad energy from the barrier considering that it {nl}was something that covered the goddess' holy relic.
Anyway, since the barrier is now broken, let's go together. {nl}If it really is a holy relic of the goddess, then it will react to the prayer for the goddess. {nl}
Will you go ahead first? {nl}I will follow as soon as I'm ready for the prayer.
A spell doll... Evil energy... It really is suspicious.
Thank you for saving me. I almost went to the goddess. {nl}I guess it is a lie that it was a holy relic of the goddess. {nl}
The relic of the goddess would not summon such a monster. {nl}I smell something fishy with that Order of the Tree of Truth.

Since the relic here wasn't real, we must find Goddess Zemyna's traces from somewhere else. {nl}It's alright. If something like this makes me frustrated, {nl}then I would not have kept my journey until here. {nl}
But before I leave, I must help the grave keeper and keep the fuss down. {nl}Now that the evil object is gone, my abilities will help keep this place calm. {nl}
I want to show my sincerity to the grave keeper, but{nl}the image of him being angry at me holds me back. {nl}If you're on the way to the grave keeper, can you send him my sincerity as well?
No wonder. That object wasn't that of the goddess. {nl}Using the name of the goddess into tricks like this. They have really crossed the line. {nl}
I want to go and make them pay for it right away. {nl}However, as a grave keeper, keeping this place secure comes first. {nl}
Was that Bokor's name Juta? {nl}Her ability powers will be of much help. {nl}
The Order of the Tree of Truth went into Carlyle's Mausoleum. {nl}They said they will find something to carry out their order or something...{nl}
If you ever go to Carlyle's Mausoleum, be careful about them. {nl}No matter how much I think about it, they are not in their right minds. {nl}
If this is not it either, I can't help but be exhausted. {nl}Where do you think Goddess Zemyna has gone?
Oh my god, the Divine Tree! {nl}The Divine Tree answered my prayers and sent someone to save me!{nl}
Thank you. I thought death was the only option for me. {nl}I am Gintas, a follower of the Order of the Tree of Truth. {nl}
We from the Order of the Tree of Truth, believe in the Divine Tree that stands tall in the kingdom. {nl}The Divine Tree is punishing the foolish people whose greed are soaring up high. {nl}
Our order will be the appointed ones of the Divine Tree and guide the world in opening a new age. {nl}Right. Are you interested in joining our order? {nl}
You are really strong, just as someone sent by the Divine Tree should be. {nl}Such strength should be used for something bigger.
I am collecting the spirit of the dead that rose back, as the order told me to. {nl}Margiris can read the memories of the dead when they were alive from the spirit stones.
She finds the sins of the dead from their memories and forgives them to purify the sins in this world. {nl}
I seem to have sprained my ankle while running away from the dead. I can't walk. {nl}Can you help me by any chance?
I'm sure my prayers reached the Divine Tree to send you here. {nl}
Brother. {nl}By this, your sins have become lighter.
There is something you need to help us with. {nl}Think of it as a test and do your best. {nl}
Carrying out sacred missions can get you to some trouble like just a while ago. {nl}You can also lose your life. {nl}
Bodies of followers are brought to Seima Stone Chamber and their sins are purified. {nl}But because of Margiris' sacred abilities, some actually get their life back. {nl}
The followers who rise back can't throw away their regrets in life and keep roaming around this place. {nl}Please use this flint to cremate the regrets and soulless bodies of the dead.
Margiris told us salvation is not something we can get so easily. {nl}
This work purifies the sins of the foolish as well as ours. {nl}Those who die during the process is because their belief is not enough. {nl}
Only those who stand it will earn salvation.
Poor Gintas... {nl}You've dealt with the despair of death alone.
Hey. If you are thinking of joining the order, don't bother. {nl}I, myself, used to be a follower of Margiris. {nl}
I used to focus on purifying the sins of the dead like Gintas. {nl}I thought I would earn salvation. {nl}
But one day, I saw the record books of Margiris. {nl}As far as I knew, those books keep a record of the process of purifying the sins of the dead. {nl}
But it was actually a record of land ownership. {nl}And I also found out that he was looking for the record of Carlyle in here.
When I read until that part of the books, Margiris killed me.
Amazing. Did righteousness bring you here?{nl}Look. Defeating Margiris does not mean anything. {nl}
If Margiris' mission fails, the Order will send someone else in here... {nl}And innnocent disciples will turn like this again. {nl}Nothing will change.

If you really want to stop the Order, then you need to find out their true objective. {nl}Find the record of Carlyle first. {nl}You need to stop the order from getting their hands on Carlyle's records.
What? {nl}You met a spirit of a believer in there? {nl}
Ah. I think it's the believer that I know of. {nl}It's embodied with regrets, keeping it from leaving and just roams around. {nl}
But don't worry. {nl}The souls that are forgiven will soon be with the Divine Tree. {nl}
Thank you for helping until here. {nl}Here, let me give you a seal of Truth. {nl}
Margiris is along the way to Carlyle's Mausoleum. {nl}If you bring this to him, he will acknowledge your contributions.
Don't tell Gintas about the story of Carlyle. {nl}He won't believe it. {nl}
I want to save you, but I don't know how...
Who are you? {nl}Ah, it's Gintas' Seal of Truth. {nl}
There are too many people who want to join the Order for Salvation. {nl}Anyway, welcome.
I think my ankle is getting better so a little more rest will do. {nl}Please be careful and may we meet again.
Sorry to ask you when you've just joined the Order, but there is something we need you to do. {nl}We are cleansing the sins of those who have died here. {nl}
I woke Carlyle's Spirit. {nl}He used to own some land of the kingdom when he was alive. {nl}
He was not able to let go of that even after his death. {nl}He hid a document of sins somewhere in this gravesite. {nl}

To save his spirit, we must find the hidden document and make him let go of his regrets from the time he was alive. {nl}But there seems to be greed left in him and he won't speak up about the whereabouts of the document. {nl}
Can you try to persuade Carlyle? {nl}Since he doesn't know your face, try to act as if you're not part of the Order. {nl}
If you find out the whereabouts of the document, I will bless you with the grace of the Divine Tree.
You just won't give up, do you. {nl}I don't know who you are or what you want. {nl}
Why are you pestering me when you won't even tell me what it is for?
I will understand if you play rough with him in case he doesn't listen to you.
What are you? {nl}Why are you disturbing other people's gravesites? {nl}
I have lived my life honestly.{nl}And you think I have hidden some document with the record of my sins?{nl}Stop speaking nonsense and go away!
If you are really on the goddess' side, then you have no reason to stand seeing something that disgraces her name. {nl}What are you waiting for? {nl}
Such awful people. {nl}Setting that up as a holy relic... {nl}
I think that seal has weakened the energy of that thing. {nl}It must have thought that we're on the same side. {nl}
Anyway, since you've taken care of that horrible thing, I will believe what you say.
No wonder it was suspicious. That leader wasn't human! {nl}Right, that thing wasn't human... {nl}
Why are they making such a fuss in this grave. What are they after?

After hearing your story, it seems that they are after {nl}the ownership of a manor in the Kaliss province. {nl}There is a copy of the list of manor owners that I used to handle when I was alive. {nl}

They must have wanted to get their hands on that copy and use it to make {nl}false testimony claiming that the lands in Kaliss belong to them. {nl}Fortunately, it seems like they were not able to find it. {nl}
I expected something like this to happen and hid the list in Seima Stone Chamber. {nl}Can you gather the scattered list of manor owners?

The manor ownership is supposed to be managed by the next generation of deputies... {nl}But he was not someone to be trusted so I requested that the manuscript {nl}of records be buried with me when I die in my will. {nl}
He may look like a good guy but even as a public official, {nl}he had private meetings with unknown people... {nl}And I caught him forging records at one point.

It gives me the chills thinking that they could have found the records. {nl}If they are preying on each province records like this, then not only Kaliss {nl}but the whole kingdom will fall under the hands of the demons soon.
Good. {nl}Those are the records of the manor owners in the Kaliss province.

Now, we have to engrave the spell doll with the energy that messes the grave. {nl}I saw the site where they cremated the dead a while ago {nl}and there was a black crystal that I've never seen before. {nl}
I'm sure the black crystals are the traces of evil magic that woke up the dead. {nl}Can you get more of it from the dead that rose?
Ah, I will take care of the fallen dead bodies. {nl}For now there is something more important to do.
Yeah, this will be enough. {nl}I will prepare the spell doll right away. Hold on.
What? You are not a follower of that Order? {nl}Are you telling me to believe you? {nl}
Alright. {nl}Then destroy that holy relic that they claim to have received the blessings of the goddess. {nl}
I have never seen a blessed holy relic fume evil energy. {nl}I think that relic is messing this gravesite.
I brought the Kaliss manor owners list to my grave to stop the corruption of the next generation. {nl}But come to think of it, this record has now become useless. {nl}
Since they will search for this document again. {nl}
I will give this record to you. If you make sure destroy it, I will be able to lay in peace again. {nl}Please.
It doesn't make sense no matter how much I think of it. {nl}How did they find this place.
Manor ownership is actually a very sensitive matter so the records are not really known to public. {nl}
Only the current deputy knows that I have handled the records. {nl}How did they know about this place...
It's strange. {nl}To have a barrier blocking people from approaching the holy relic.{nl}
Even if it is sacred, if that is how it is, no one can approach it. {nl}I mean, it's as if it doesn't want anybody to come near it.
Place this Evil Thoughts Stone then defeat the dead nearby.{nl}The souls of the dead will be absorbed into this stone.{nl}
This cleanses the sins of the dead and yours too. {nl}Also, Margiris will be very happy about it. {nl}
Good luck then.

Ask Eduinas

Chase the mysterious girl to the direction where she has disappeared to.

Hand over the herbs to Druid Leja

Obtain %s
Druid Leja told you that she will tell you several locations where the ferrets are likely to hide the girl and she will also give you the scent. Talk to her.
Let the scent spread and search the base camp of the ferrets
You have to find the girl while the ferrets are unconscious. But, in order to spread the scent, you would need a bonfire and you have to be aware that the usage time is short.
Rescue the mysterious girl
You have to save the mysterious girl while the ferrets are unconscious due to the scent.
You've obtained the stone!
You couldn't obtain anything!
This stone slate is the Light of Salvation?{nl}It looks like just an old slate to me.
You mean you want to enter the Crystal Mine to find the Light of Salvation? {nl}

So we are not in the situation to spare our troops for guarding Revelators while they search for the Light of Salvation. {nl}But we also can't go against the order of the bishop and the Knight Commander either. {nl}
Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your helping the villagers.{nl}The Light of Salvation that the Revelators are looking for might be found in the Closed Area.
But some force prevented me from approaching it, as if it was destined for ownership by a certain being.{nl}A few days after the incident, the bishop dreamed about the Light of Salvation.{nl}
Perhaps that force I felt was the Light of Salvation...{nl}That's what I think.
This is all because of the dream of the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl}What's all this about a 'Light of Salvation' in the Crystal Mine? I have never seen such thing. {nl}
Thank you for saving me.{nl}You must also be a Revelator who has come in search of the Light of Salvation.{nl}
Anyway, the bishop himself also had a dream while praying in closure. {nl}In his dream, the goddess told him the evidence of salvation will be found in the Crystal Mine. {nl}
I'm in a bit of trouble.{nl}I have to put up notice boards, but I wouldn't be able to do so even with two of myself.{nl}
The Kedoran Merchant Alliance is really rough on newcomers you see.{nl}Leopoldas is especially brutal... He made me do all of this by myself.
Really?{nl}Is this really okay..{nl}
If so, could you set these notice boards up down there?{nl}Jurate is excavating holy artifacts down there you see. {nl}
I'm sure that you'll be discrete in helping out.{nl}I have to be somewhere else as well.
Thank you.{nl}You didn't get caught by Leopoldas, did you?
My name is Serapinas, a newcomer of the Kedoran Merchant Alliance.{nl}I'm promoting the Merchant Alliance at the moment.{nl}Umm... If you have the time, would you mind helping me do some promotion?
Edita

I am Edita. I am in charge of the Retrieval team for the Merchant Alliance.{nl}I'm sure you're curious as to why we're retrieving items here.{nl}You may have heard from Leopoldas, but we are providing much needed items and materials to people.

{nl}I was carting items for the Merchant Alliance like any other day past here towards Fedimian.{nl}But I could have never known. That it would be later known as Medzio Diena...{nl}All of our carts were upturned... The items in those carts burried all over.

{nl}That's why retrieval teams were created, and why I am here.{nl}Some are locating them with detectors for more efficient retrieval.{nl}Some are going to those locations for excavation.{nl}If you wish to help, there's a spot there that we've marked so bring the item after carefully digging it out.
There are many monsters nearby that are threatening the members of the Merchant Alliance.{nl}Could you clear them out for us?
Be careful.
Thank you for bringing it back.
The excavation team has just reported that there is something burried there.{nl}Could you take a look?{nl}It'll take a while for the retrieval team to get there...
Theses are records from the Merchant Alliance.{nl}They're ripped to pieces.{nl}Most likely done by monsters.{nl}Give them here.

These are records of the arrow materials the Merchant Alliance had previously provided to Lydia Schaffen and the first Fletcher Master.{nl}It is too difficult for me to restore, so we'll have to try in the city.
There should be something north of here as well.{nl}I can't seem to find exactly where though.{nl}I'll give you the detector so why don't you give it a try.
Try carefully digging there after you've located it.
Try using the detector as you go slowly upwards.
{nl}This is a mysterious Ink. {nl}It's a secret Ink used to write important documents.{nl}We suspect that it was used to hide records.
{nl}Ah, we'll take care of the rest by ourselves.{nl}You've been a great help!
Hello.{nl}I am Margellius the record keeper for the Kedoran Merchant Alliance.
{nl}You've come on the request of Leopoldas.{nl}Then could you retrieve the educational materials taken by the monsters?{nl}
You saw the newcomers that are under Leopoldas right?{nl}It's neccessary material for their education.
If we retrieve the information that the monsters have taken, I'm planning on creating more copies to give to the newcomers.
Now I'll record more information.{nl}Ink crafted from the fluids of monsters lasts a long time and is durable.{nl}I'll give you some traps, so could you get some for me?

Plant the trap near monsters.{nl}The monsters will faint when they step on the trap...{nl}You'll then be able to extract their fluids when they're still alive.{nl}But, only the monsters over there have the neccessary fluids.{nl}So use the trap over there.
It can only be obtained from the monsters at the plaza over there.{nl}Use the trap near them.
Now I can craft tombstones.{nl}Try making one yourself.{nl}I'll give you the materials and tools again.
Good job.{nl}I'm sure Giedra over there will also require your help.

Bookbinding is also an important part of making a scripture.{nl}You have to bind them with sturdy string.{nl}String made from monster leather is ideal, but they are too short.{nl}I'll give you an anvil so would you mind creating Bookbinding String from the leather straps?
Listen up. First gather leather straps from monsters, then use this anvil to craft Lump of Sturdy Strings for Bookbinding with them.{nl}Connect the short pieces into a longer string for bookbinding.
You're amazing!{nl}Now all that's left is my part.{nl}Thank you for helping me.
Everything is in order now! Now I'll go to Fasika Plateau!{nl}Hahahahahahahahaha!!
Oh come on...{nl}The Nestos sign was created after the falling out with the Anastos.{nl}
{nl}Antanas and Giedra here seem to be holding it, but why do I keep losing it so often...{nl}Anyways, I want to go on a pilgrimage to Fasika Plateau where there are more Nestos now!{nl}Thank you!
Pill?{nl}You should be able to get that from the equipment merchant.
Take care on the long road ahead.
Yes. I've prepared the pill you've requested.{nl}Farewell.
Have you retrieved the pill?
Now go.
Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}I am Albinas from the Anastospa.{nl}
This is a tombstone erected by the people of Nestospa as an offering to the goddess.{nl}As you can see, it has become so defiled that it is attracting mobs of monsters.{nl}
What could Nestospa possibly be thinking...{nl}What good are sanctums and tombstones when the goddess is missing?{nl}
They can keep making them, but they're all just going to get defiled like this.{nl}

Unlike them, the people of Anastospa have a good grasp of reality.{nl}We know that our priority should be saving the people we can actually see before us and getting rid of the demons, rather than thinking about the goddess who is already gone.
What do you think?{nl}How about helping us get rid of the demons even if our beliefs are slightly different.
Even though the goddess is gone now, Nestospa continues to pursue its faith blindly.{nl}That is why they keep building these sanctuaries everywhere.
{nl}Human life comes first, and then our next priority is wiping out the demons we can see before us, and beyond that, as long as the goddess has abandoned us, is there even a need for faith anymore?
Thank you so much for agreeing to help me.{nl}We really need to teach Nestospa a lesson.{nl}
There are more than a few defiled tombstones.{nl}I shall destroy this one, so you go and destroy the tombstones over there.{nl}
That tombstone over there should also be glowing red.{nl}Just like the tombstone next to you. It's evidence that it has been defiled.
What is this...{nl}
Who're you? {nl}Who do you think you are, touching our tombstone?
This is Nestospa's sacred tombstone.{nl}Are you the one that did this to our tombstone?
I've never seen or heard of anyone like that.{nl}
I don't know every member of the Anastos...{nl}But I know most of them since we are from the same church.
I am at a loss for words.{nl}Albinas? A member of the Anastos? It can't be!{nl}
Bring him to me! {nl}I must see for myself!
You'll take responsibility and restore the tombstone?{nl}I really don't like you, but if you're willing to do that, I guess I've got no choice.
I'm only agreeing to this for the goddess' sake.{nl}Luckily there are lots of stones around here.{nl}
Obtain some suitable stone blocks and go find Eduinas at the Nestos Camp over there.{nl}
Eduinas will not be happy if he knows that you've done this to the tombstone.{nl}Get ready to take responsibility for that at the very least.
Are you almost done yet? If you're going to take responsibility, you should get hustlin'.{nl}Don't just linger around here wasting time.
Who are you?{nl}And what is this rock you've got here?
What? You destroyed the tombstone?{nl}We worked so hard to erect that tombstone and you destroyed it?
I don't need your apology.{nl}Since Damijonas requested it, I'll start working on this, but please don't ever do that again.{nl}
I don't want to see you while I get the materials ready.{nl}Go and clear the area of monsters or something.
I need more time.{nl}I can't just magically make a tombstone appear out of thin air, you know.
All done. {nl}Now, don't do that ever again.
You've gathered the neccessary items. Let's see if we can repair it.{nl}It's lucky that it wasn't damaged too badly.
We've never had any trouble with Anastos, just some different opinions.{nl}We have to be suspicious since we've heard a name that we know nothing about.{nl}
Especially since they've destroyed the tombstone that we've barely managed to craft.{nl}We'll forgive them since they've taken responsibility.{nl}
However, it's very strange.{nl}I have never heard of that name.{nl}
Aren't you dejected to go like this?{nl}Anastos has their camp up there so why don't you go ask them.This is strange...
Yes, of Anastos... that is correct.{nl}You've come here to ask about something?{nl}Oh dear, I am quite flustered at the moment so it's a bit difficult to answer anything..{nl}
We might get a break if you can manage to retrieve the research materials that I'm looking for.
They're my research records, but the monsters took off with them for some reason.{nl} I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}
I'll be able to talk to you once I get those documents back.
They're my research records, but the monsters took off with them for some reason.{nl} I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}
These are the data with the differences between Anastos and Nestos.{nl}There should be an opportunity to explain after finding the data.
Let's see...{nl} This one's here... That one's not here... Now where's that one...
Oh, yes.{nl} You've found them all.
{nl}What was it you wanted to ask me about?
Albinas?{nl} I haven't heard that name before.
And you say he spoke of Anastospa and told you to destroy the tombstone?{nl} No way, we would never do anything like that.{nl}
Both Nestospa and we are people who revere the goddess and are focused in our faith.{nl} Though we are a bit more realistic in our pursuits than the people of Nestos are.
Focusing on defeating demons and preparing for calamities.. {nl}More than simply devout faith in the goddesses.{nl}
This is definitely strange. {nl}We'll need to send someone to investigate.{nl}
Oh, we'll have to give him a flare in case of trouble.. But there seems to be a lack of useful materials.{nl}Could you gather some if you have the time?
Get me some flamable powder.{nl}It won't be too difficult to find since there are always more than enough monsters.
By the way Alvydas... You are really awkward.{nl}For what reasons have you mentioned our faction?
Now we'll have to wait for the results.{nl}He's a capable person, so it won't take too long.
How about doing some investigation ourselves in the meanwhile.{nl}
Of course. Barte might know something.{nl}He hasn't been here too long and he's quite the knowledgeable chap.{nl}
How about asking him about the person called Albinas?{nl}
I will wait for Fabijus here.{nl}It'd be great to bring back a certain answer.
I am indeed Barte.{nl}What's the matter?{nl}
Albinas?{nl}Umm.. I did see a person that looks similar to what you've described.{nl}
She was strange.{nl}Since only the pilgrims visit this place, it was quite a strange sight.{nl}
She was staring absently at something leather-like then suddenly teared it apart.{nl}To do such a feat with bare hands.{nl}
It wasn't the strength of a human. I was trembling.{nl}They disappeared soon after throwing away the shredded leather.{nl}
There might still be a bit of leather left if you head down there. I... I'm too afraid to go even if it was an order from a goddess.
I believe that lether is still there.{nl}As for me... I would not have courage to venture into the place even if it is the will of the goddesses.
I have no idea what's hidden in the leather.{nl}I hope there's a bit of leather left.
What if the monsters have eaten it?
Let me take a look.{nl}Hm..{nl}
I have seen this crest before...{nl}Ah... Ah!{nl}
I remember now. I've seen it in a book.{nl}It's the crest of the 'Lunatic Demon King', Vaiga!{nl}
What on earth could be happening.{nl}No one else uses such insignia unless they work for Vaiga.{nl}
We have to alert the others about this!{nl}You go tell Gedas!{nl}
There's no time.{nl}Hurry!
What?{nl}No way... You think Vaiga has sent his pawn?
Fabijus.. What's going to happen to him?{nl}What should we do?
We must let everyone know!{nl}Please, notify Gedas!{nl}
To get rid of demons, they are much more adequate than us.{nl}They'll surely help if you can explain the situation to them!
Oh dear, you mean, we have been played by the demons all along?{nl}I knew something was fishy!{nl}
It's dangerous to go alone, take this Holy Water.{nl}It can do one hell of damage.
Thank goodness, you are safe.{nl}Fabijus told me about who Albinas really was.{nl}
Those demons threatened us after their covers have been blown and you saved us.{nl}It truly must be the will of the goddess that you came.{nl}Thank you.
Are you hearing yourself right now?{nl}You have a lot of nerve coming back after breaking the stele.{nl}
Do you expect me to believe that you were just following what someone whom you don't even know very well nor be able to bring here said?{nl}Seriously?
Words fail me.
Nevermind!{nl}Such irreverence...
What do you want now?{nl}I am too busy figuring out how to restore the stele. Leave me alone.
Have you told others about the identity of Albinas?{nl}My guess is that you rushed to get here...{nl}
Could you forward the story to them as well?{nl}We will put aside our differences and actively find the solution.
What happened to that demon?{nl}
I'm glad to hear that Holy Water that I gave you was of some use.{nl}It's terrifying to think that demons walking among us and dividing us. They must be really desperate.{nl}
Could you inform Damijonas of this as well?{nl}He would be protecting the stele that got destroyed last time.
The demon's plan has been foiled all thanks to you.{nl}We might have crossed the point of no return forever.
Oh, good. {nl}So, have you found something about Albinas?{nl}
My word, all this was Vagia's trickery?{nl}Thank the goddesses we didn't fall for it...{nl}
There must be someone else who have fallen for a trick like this other than us.{nl}These demons are not just using brute force but also the cunning plans to divide us internally..{nl}
Althought the first one was a lucky accident but thank you for all you have done.{nl}May goddesses be with you.
After you have destroyed the stele, Damijonas is guarding it even more attentively.{nl}I don't see any chance that it could ever get destroyed again?
It gives me chills every time I think about it.{nl}A demon living among us.
Albinas is gone! What has happened?
We have no choice. {nl}It's far too wide and there are so many things here that look like a monocle. We should split up.{nl}
You check the Bingcoolers Path area.{nl}Who know? {nl}Demons might have something special.
It really angers me.{nl}Demons do not deserve any mercy.{nl}
Is that so? My side also had demons only, nothing else.{nl}That's strange. There must be something here.{nl}
Let's check the other side..
Wait!{nl}I can see the great energy coming from Leima Small Square.{nl}
Look at that.. It must be something gigantic. {nl}Come on, go and have a look.{nl}
I'm not much of a combat-type person, so, I will just stay hidden here.{nl}What am I going to do when demons show up, ay?
Huh? Outsiders.. Who are you?{nl}How did you get past all the guards?{nl}
Are you, perhaps, seeking the secret behind Ruklys?{nl}
Speak honestly otherwise face the consequences.{nl}This old body, you might not sense it yet, is full of holy energy.
You can't miss it, really. The sheer size of it stands out.{nl}Promise me that you won't keep it to yourself when you find it.
Yes! A revelation...{nl}Only the Revelators know the existence of the revelation.{nl}
I am the keeper of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}Perhaps, you are the one for whom I have been waiting.{nl}
I am well aware of the fact that Ruklys has hidden the revelation in this place.{nl}If you too are looking for it, I will gladly help.
I, though an old man, will serve as a guide to your quest to retrieve the revelation.{nl}It is no where in sight here. 'Tis best to move on.
Oh my, how silly of me.{nl}I have forgotten about the devices I have laid around here to keep intruders away.{nl}
To make a certificate, we first need a mushroom.{nl}There are many mushrooms at the Sunken Path, so please get me one.
Let's inscribe the magic of the fortress into the mushroom you have brought.{nl}
Unfortunately, my body is not what it used to be.{nl}Wielding magic might overwhelm my withered body.{nl}
Do not despair! The monsters in the fortress possess energy that might serve as a substitute for my weak magic.{nl}Please, gather it for me. {nl}
The monsters that have been residing in this area for some time are bound to have Earth Crystals on them.
It's not like the olden days.{nl}Reckless usage of magic... will take its toll on my olden body.
A certicate is just a fancy word. The principle behind it is quite simple.{nl}What matters the most is ingredients and how you mix them.{nl}
The process will not take long. {nl}Please, wait for a moment.
Now, Storage Quarter will be accessible.{nl}Clues to find the revelation must be there.{nl}
I will be waiting for you there.
You came quick.{nl}Now, I have got some work for you to do.
It's dangerous to go alone, take this.{nl}Now my devices will not attack you.

For all my life, I have been guarding this place but my struggle bore no fruit on where the revelation lies.{nl}However, if we could consult with the spirit who has lived the era when Ruklys walked, we might get some answer.{nl}
The thing on my side is devised to read the memory of the spirits.{nl}I made it myself. I have done this before.{nl}
No remorse for revolting.{nl}This Restraint Token will calm them down.
The spirits are left with nothing but rage.{nl}Guilt is no where to be felt.
This Rajatad's Egg has the power to restrain the spirits.{nl}What we need to do is to actualize it.
Nothing works better than to use Demon Bone.{nl}Get me the bone and I will extract the power and inject it into the bone.{nl}
Good, good. I will make an orb.{nl}One final step remains before the Restraint Token.
They say they destroyed something on Ruklys' command.{nl}I suspect that something might be related to the revelation of the goddess.
We must find out what the device was that Ruklys destroyed.{nl}Thanks to you, I can now delve deeper into their memories.{nl}
The deeper I go, the more they will attempt to resist.{nl}When that happens, subdue them with your strength and use the token.
Fill this orb with the life force of the monsters.{nl}That will complete the whole process of restraining and actualizing the energy.{nl}
Knowing how to operate it is different from being able to actually operate it.{nl}Those spirits took the secret to their graves and beyond.
Treasures mean dirt to me at the moment.{nl}Even I care about the kingdom.  {nl}
The revelation you are looking for... {nl}It should not fall into the hands of the demons, should it?{nl}
You have promised Eminent to meet up here, right?{nl}Let's check the monocle before he comes.{nl}Talk to me again, if you are ready.
AH!{nl}The scroll, now I remember.
Remember this? {nl}It is the defense magic scroll that was hidden inside the treasure chest on the secret location.{nl}
The scroll contains instructions on how to operate the defensive {nl}magic circle that can fend off demons and how to repair it.{nl}I hope this can foil Eminent's plan.{nl}
Firstly, you need to follow Eminent's orders to distract him.{nl}At the same time, you and I will activate the magic circle secretly.
How did it go?{nl}The remaining foundation stone is located near the Ikveta Podium.{nl}
However, demon totems are suppressing the power of foundation stone.{nl}I tried to get close to it but there are demons, you see.
Ah, keep in mind that Eminent might get suspicious if you take too much time.{nl}As soon as the foundation stone gets activated, you need to get back to Eminent.
No need to keep it secret anymore.{nl}Let me introduce myself properly. I am Premier Eminent who served King Kadumel 600 years ago.{nl}
I thoroughly understand your disbelief.{nl}But please, do allow me to explain.
He along with the demons massacred the Royal Army mercilessly.{nl}My army and I came here.{nl}
It was a long and arduous battle. {nl}But the goddess favored me and victory we saw.{nl}
The divine voice of the goddess laid upon me at the victorious moment. {nl}She appointed me to protect the revelation instead of that treacherous Ruklys.{nl}
After a long wait, you finally came.{nl}The prophecy spoke no falsehood and you brought me here. The place where the revelation was hidden.{nl}
Enough with the apology, let us resume our quest to find the revelation.{nl}The spirits told me that there is a device that bridges the battlegrounds to the revelation.{nl}
I now know what the device was for, all thanks to you.{nl}I will meet you on the fortress battlegrounds, for I need to prepare something.
Ah, you're still here?{nl}What good news. Lend me your hand.{nl}
This is a page from the journal written by the Ruklys' army! {nl}I am quite certain there are more pages.{nl}
If you find them, please, do give them to me.{nl}Wilhelmina Carriot will be happy to see this.
If you find them, please, do give them to me.{nl}Wilhelmina Carriot will be happy to see this.
Thank heavens, you are still alive.{nl}Remember the time when i was looking around through the monocle?{nl}
I thought the object contained some special power but only demons were there.{nl}
And when we arrived at the living quarter, I checked the area with the monocle again.{nl}I sensed some great energy. Remember that as well?{nl}
At the time, you said only an old manager was there.{nl}
That old manager... I don't know what is going on.{nl}You heard him right? He said he is the Premier Eminent who should have died 600 years ago!
The whole shenanigan of making the certificate.{nl}What did he say? "Overwhelm my withered body", my behind!{nl}
There are many old mages and clerics. What about them, eh?{nl}He only said those things to cover something up!{nl}
Something was not well with the spirits, also! {nl}Why would they be so enraged against him, if he was a good man?{nl}
I do sense something foul is going on.{nl}There must be something we are not seeing straight.
I pray I am wrong.{nl}It is best if you return to the man called Eminent. It's no good if he suspects you. {nl}
Please, be careful.
Are you telling me that he was with the demons?{nl}And they were not attacking him at all?{nl}
That truly is suspicious. {nl}What I said earlier was a mere conjecture but... we should see it for ourselves.{nl}
That man calling himself Eminent, I will meet him with you. {nl}His true identity will be revealed through this monocle.
Oh, you came.{nl}Let us trace back the memory of the spirits.{nl}
They destroyed the device on Ruklys' command. {nl}So, that must mean if we repair it, it will lead us to the revelation.{nl}
I know where the device is but in order to repair it, we need the parts. {nl}We could get the cogs from the traps he made.{nl}
I will search the Paramiso Battle Field, you take the Ataka Side Road.{nl}Get everything you can lay your hands on.{nl}
Ah, please, do not, under no circumstance, disturb the defensive magic circle.{nl}One false move and we are dead. We are all dead.
The parts are needed to revive the device.{nl}Please, find them from the traps set up in the area near Ataka Side Road.

The Savior who followed all the way here by having faith in the revelation.{nl}You're gradually getting closer to the truth.{nl}Savior, what does the Divine Tree mean to human beings?{nl}A symbol of calamity, the roots of everyone's sorrow in this land...{nl}No. That's the image created by the crooked hearts of the demons.

In the beginning... there was God.{nl}A sky with dancing stars, land to support that sky...{nl}It was all created together with humans and other lives.{nl}And thus the world was created. {nl}The God who painted the world with radiance had fallen to an eternal dream.

The Divine Tree. It is another form that God has taken for himself.{nl}The God had turned into a tree that will breathe life out to the world, making the world complete.{nl}We are beings that are born to groom the world and the Divine Tree.{nl}The God has asked us not to wake him up from his slumber.{nl}Thus, we lived side by side in the new peaceful age.{nl}However, there began a feeling of thirst within the hearts of some.

The fact that God is not by us.{nl}The moment that people realized the abscence of God was the source of their thirst,{nl}we could no longer live together. {nl}In the end, the thirst that has craved for God had grown into obsession for awakening the God.{nl}They threw away the name that God had given them to call themselves demons.{nl}The obsessions... It has brought calamity upon this world.

In order to be loved... They had decided they needed to disobey God's words and awaken him.{nl}Savior, you are the one that will take God's revelation and save this world from the demons,{nl}and truly make this world complete by completing his will. {nl}The time is nigh.{nl}I will be waiting for you in the cruel place that the tyrant has carved out.
Good thing he doesn't seem to find anything suspicious. {nl}We must not give any parts to Eminent until the magic circle of Ruklys is activated.
I took a look at the location of the foudation stone on the scroll.{nl}The magic circle only gets properly activated with this.{nl}
First, the foundation stone under Slepti Watchtower.{nl}The writings on the pole were erased so the magic circle is not working.{nl}
It will work when you write on it again. {nl}I'll take care of the magic circle below so I'll leave this to you.
Ah, I almost forgot.{nl}The scroll says that anything with magic would suffice.{nl}
I think demon blood would work.{nl}Let's try it out.
Be sure not to be caught by Eminent.
The harrowing place forged by a tyrant you speak of might mean... {nl}The prison made in the Kadumel dynasty. {nl}
All I know is it's Kalejimas.{nl}
Thanks. But our townspeople usually stay away from the outsiders.{nl}It is a rare sight to see them asking an outsider for a favor.{nl}If you are thinking of going to my town, turn away now.

On your way here, you have met a girl and a demon that was chasing her?{nl}Never let a Revelator meet up with the girl...{nl}Not all that jolly.. but it seems it's none of your business, don't you think so?
I beg your pardon? You are the Revelator?{nl}That must mean you also had that a horrible nightmare as well.{nl}...Perhaps you are the outsider the legend talks about.{nl}

In our town, we have this legend told by Goddess Goddess Laima.{nl}When the town is in danger, worry not, there will come a stranger with the light divine{nl}Evil shall fall by the might of the light. {nl}It is no time to be standing here. I must go to town and see what's going on.{nl}

Ah..about the food.. We do need to get back the food ferrets stole..{nl}The water in the forest turned red and the fruits have become unusually enlarged since Medzio Diena.{nl}The water and the fruits somehow are all poisoned.{nl}Food is scare around here. Those darn ferrets steal our food.{nl}
Revelator. This town is having a food crisis.{nl}Please, use this anti-ferret paralysis powder to retrieve the food they stole.{nl}I will head back to town and ask more about the legend.

Ah, is that you whom Leja talked about?{nl}The town cleric says you have brought light into this village.{nl}Ye finally came. After all these years. The stranger to rescue.{nl}O! Praise be unto Goddess Laima... Our hearts sing prayers in full to you. You have not forsakened us..{nl}
What could that be? Ha! You actually managed to get the food back from the ferrets!{nl}You are truly the one to save our town. My deepest gratitude.
Leja went to Laimadon. Saying that Goddess Laima must have left something for us in the giant statue of her.{nl}

According to the legend told. This town was formerly a town that worshiped Goddess Laima in Goddess Laimadon.{nl}Long ago, Goddess Laima went on a pilgrimage after foreseeing the terrible future. {nl}Goddess Laima cared deeply about the townspeople and asked Goddess Lada to look after us when she is gone.{nl}And if a great threat, even greater than the power of Goddess Lada, a stranger chasing a nightmore will arrive{nl}along with the light and save the town.{nl}

Not long after her disappearance, Medzio Diena happened... It was the future Laima has predicted...{nl}The river turned red and poisonous and it tainted the fruits as well.{nl}While this was going on the demon started to invade.. They were after Goddess Lada and we failed to protect her.{nl}The demons responsible for kidnapping the goddess made the peaceful ferrets very ferocious.{nl}

The ferocious ferrets are constantly invading our town and taking our food.{nl}In the ferret hideout, you will find the totem planted by the demons. We suspect it is responsible for the ferret's recent change of behavior.{nl}Would you be willing to destroy the totem in the ferret's hideout for us?{nl}Without the ferret problem, our town would have no further trouble.
And one more thing, if that totem is as important as we think it is, the demons will not stand idly by.{nl}Be careful...
You have destroyed the Demon Totem! Words cannot express how grateful, we are.{nl}As for my ferrets, I will send my grandson to check up on them.{nl}You have something else to do.

A mysterious girl came into our town while you were busy destroying the totem.{nl}She silently passed through the town to Laimadon.{nl}Our forefathers told us that when Laima the Goddess pays her visit to the town, the soft warmth stays on the town.{nl}The soft warmth we all felt when the mysterious girl was passing through..{nl}
She too must have been the one sent by Goddess Laima just like you are.{nl}Follow that girl, if you are the one foretold by the legend, you will be able to find her trace.{nl}
Please, save our town and Goddess Lada.

Oh drat! Bad new. While away to get the juice, the ferrets came again and took more food!{nl}We need a permanent solution.{nl}Perhaps, this time just giving them the food would be better. Of course, I don't mean that we should give up the fight.{nl}We give them the food and teach them a lesson of not taking something that is not yours.{nl}
It's a simple plan. We'll find the food that the ferrets stole, and season them a bit.{nl}With Corrupted Red Water.
We will not take this anymore.
That should be enough to poison the food. Good work.

Now, the ferrets tend to stick the stolen food inside fruit basket.{nl}Go to the ferret's hideout and season the stolen food with the crimson water.{nl}What matters the most is to poison the fresh ones.{nl}The ferrets are stupid and lazy and prone to let food rot because they forgot.{nl}It's no use if they think they just got sick from bad food. Only the fresh ones will do the trick.
I mean, really, they let so much food go to waste because they forgot {nl}and eventually they let it rot and then they come back to steal again.{nl}I mean, we pay for their stupidity.
How does the phrase go? One step back, two steps forward?{nl}Bon appetit, ferrets!

Ah Revelator. Thank you so much for destroying the demon totem.{nl}Unfortunately, grandfather told me to look whether the ferrets have become tame,{nl}but they are still as ferocious as ever. {nl}Could it be that the effect from the totem lingers?{nl}

That got me thinking. Demons used a totem as a means of influence, right?{nl}How about we build something similar to counter-act the effect?{nl}Could you ask Widas whether my guess is feasible or not? {nl}Dievdirbys Widas is the best Dievdirbys in town.
A statue to counter-act the demon influences, eh?{nl}Hmm let's see...
The ferrets I grew up with were quite a friendly and kind bunch. {nl}When I got lost, they were kind enough to take me back to town.{nl}What could have made them like that?

I, too, got a similar idea when I heard that a totem is influencing the ferrets to be ferocious.{nl}So, I experimented on creating a statue that has a reverse effect...{nl}It's still in an experiemental stage but with the totem gone, it's a fine time to try it out...{nl}
Here, this is the statue I made...{nl}After you place it, please, stick around a bit to see how they react...

Back in the good ol' days, I used to make ferret statues while observing them...{nl}But now, even an eye contact with them provokes them to attack..{nl}I hope, this statue will bring peace to both humans and the ferrets...
What? It only provoked the ferrets even more...?{nl}Oh dear, is that a failure...?

Ah... It is too early to despair... {nl}The lingering demon influence might be interfering with this positive effect...{nl}I cannot do this alone. {nl}I need to consult this with Druid Benes of Laimadon, an expert on ferrets...
Ah, Revelator! You came earlier than I expected.{nl}I tried to go to the giant statue but the ferrets made it very difficult...
Huh? The mysterious girl might be the chosen leader sent by Goddess Laima?{nl}The girl ran that way right before you came...{nl}The ferrets were chasing after her so I did find it quite odd...{nl}
Revelator, there is no time! The girl went that way.{nl}The ferrets are on a hunt for her.{nl}Defeat the ferrets, if you have to. Just the girl. Please, hurry.
I pray for her safety...
...The girl has been kidnapped? That's terrible...{nl}Demon Lord Zaura must be behind this! {nl}He is responsible for kidnapping Goddess Lada as well.
Be careful when gathering Drowsy Herb.{nl}One false move and the spore explodes and, believe me, it WILL make you drowsy.
Were the ferrets present when Zaura was kidnapping her?{nl}I saw ferrets carrying a huge bag.{nl}I suspect it was her inside. I mean, ferrets don't usually.{nl}

If the ferrets did take her away, they are guarding her as well.{nl}If you go straight down, there is drowsy herb.{nl}Bring it to me and I will make an incense that will make them very drowsy.{nl}While they are passed out, the rescue would be very easy.
One, two, three...{nl}Yep, that seems to be enough.{nl}Wait a moment, please.
Don't worry about getting drowsy yourself.{nl}It is specifically designed to affect only the ferrets.{nl}The paralysis powder is my invention also.

The drowsy scent is complete! {nl}Set a campfire and put it in the fire and nearby ferrets {nl}will be drowsier than a night of heavey feast.{nl}I will mark the spots to which I suspect they might have taken her.{nl}If you find the girl, quickly burn the scent.
There... Tree... Under... The goddess...
Goddess' Orb

Revelator... I am Laima, the goddess of fate.{nl}You have done well following the girl who is a living embodiment of my will.{nl}In this forest, my sister Lada is imprisoned by the cruel Demon Lord Zaura.{nl}Zaura is constructing an abominable object called 'Kruvina'. {nl}It is made from the life force drained from Lada.{nl}

Revelator... Please, save my sister, Goddess Lada. {nl}Goddess Lada is being held captive in the Seir Rainforest.{nl}And I beseech thee to take this orb with you. It will prove itself useful on your journey.
The Ferret Transformation Scroll is complete. {nl}When you use it, you can transform you into a ferret.{nl}Worry not, it is based on careful observation of ferrets. You will look very natural.{nl}
You will most likely be able to converse naturally with the ferret tribe. {nl}Talk to the ferret tribe and ask about why they are aligning with the demons.
Be careful not to transform back to your original state. {nl}They will attack you all at once. The sheer number will overwhelm even you.
Is that so? Are you telling me the ferrets are helping the demons on their free will?{nl}No, that's impossible! I cannot believe it...

Did the ferrets really say that? Ah, of course, you have no reason to lie..{nl}Forgive me for my rudeness but this is very unbelieveable...{nl}Or could it be possible that they have been brainwashed so {nl}fundamentally that they don't even realize they are being brainwashed?{nl}

A further experimentation is in order. {nl}This is a block of wood that I have changed its shape via my magic.{nl}This wooden block is in the shape of an injured man. Let's set it up it around the ferrets.{nl}I mean, even if the ferrets are attacking people on their own accord, they would not go as far as{nl}attacking an injured man, would they? Assuming they are in their right minds.
If the ferrets attack it, that would be the ultimate proof {nl}that they are still under the control of the demons.
They attacked it, you say? I knew it, they are indeed mind controlled!{nl}I guess, that's something...
Let us not rejoice so soon yet...{nl}The fact that they are attacking even an injured man {nl}means that their brutal behaviour is still on.{nl}They are still very dangerous..{nl}

We'll have to expel the ferrets since we can't do anything else about them at the moment.{nl}I have an incense that ferrets hate.{nl}The ferrets will most likely run away if you burn the awful incense at a campfire.{nl}It is a tad pungent for people as well... So I hope that you'll be able to cope...
I will make more of these.{nl}There has to be enough for everyone in town.
Thank you so much. Without you, you enlightened us about the ferrets.{nl}The mind control will one day wear off, won't it?{nl}Until then, we will be working on a way to make them calm.
Goddess Lada
My heart is filled with gratitude.{nl}From you, I sense the power of my sister, Laima...{nl}I worry for her safety...

The Demon Lord Zaura is trying to form a powerful {nl}crystal known as Kruvina by using my life force.{nl}The Kruvina is usually made with the life force of those human sacrifices. {nl}It has the power to enlarge plants.{nl}The demons have a plan to wipe out humanity through these enlarged plants.{nl}

The water in the forest turned red and the unnatural growth of both trees {nl}and their fruits are all due to the Kruvina made from human life forces.{nl}The demons like the power of the Kruvina so much {nl}that they wanted to make even more powerful Kruvina.{nl}They attempted to drain the life force from a goddess.{nl}
The Kruvina is an entity that should not exist in this world. It must be destroyed.{nl}This very moment is the golden opportunity! {nl}While Demon Lord Zaura is away treating his fatal wound!
The Kruvina here is unstable since it used my life force little by little.{nl}However, something made of a goddess' life force is not easy to destroy.{nl}

From you I can feel the power of Laima. Have you brought the orb of Laima? If so, {nl}the process is easy. Use the orb to neutralize the Kruvina. But the power is slightly lacking... {nl}That comes later. Right now, destroying the device that is restraining me and the machine {nl}that is creating Kruvina is the first thing you should do. After that, I will breathe my powers into {nl}the orb. I cannot promise you much for I have little power left in me.
Well done. The creation of the Kruvina has been halted. It will not grow anymore.{nl}Thank you for your service.
This is not the end. No matter how imperfect the Kruvina is.{nl}Even in its imperfect state, the Kruvina is a far too dangerous thing to exist.{nl}
Now, I will breathe most of the power I have left in me into this orb.{nl}The power of a goddess will grant even a human like you the strength to destroy the Kruvina.
Now, my power unto your orb.
Demon Lord Zaura will not stand idly by while you are destroying it...{nl}Please, take care of yourself...

An interference from the Beholder... That was quite unexpected..{nl}But, it matters not... Revelator... It's not your fault at all.{nl}If you have not foiled the demon's plan, the Kruvina would have been completed.{nl}Stopping its creation itself is worthy of great praise.{nl}My dear sister, Laima, would have seen the Beholder's interference well in advance.
Thank you for saving me, Revelator.{nl}You did a great job on putting an end to the demon's plan.{nl}As for I, stabilizing the forest along with the townspeople is my duty.{nl}

Right before the self-imposed wandering, she told me something.{nl}She said, there will be a disaster, even she could not prevent...{nl}When that time comes, lead a stranger with her orb to the hand of the giant Goddess Statue.{nl}Take the orb of Laima and go to the hand of the giant statue.
I worry about my other sisters...
Ah... No, it can't be...{nl}Laima is being held captive by Giltine...{nl}Savior... Please, stop Giltine and her evil plan and save Laima...{nl}
I will call out to my sisters after the situation at this {nl}place gets stabilized and return to my full power...
The legend was true!{nl}You actually manage to defeat the demon and save Goddess Lada. {nl}You truly are what Goddess Laima told us about. Thank you!{nl}

There used to be a temple for worshiping the goddess. It got tuppled off by the demons.{nl}I am waiting for Goddess Lada and Laima to return and {nl}trying to rebuild the temple with the help of the townspeople.{nl}However, there are still some demon remnants.{nl}
So, here's what I want to ask you to do. Help us mop up the demon remnants.{nl}With your help, we could drive them off much quickly.
I don't understand why the demons still stick around even after their Demon Lord has fallen. {nl}What's the point?
Thank you. The number of demons has significantly decreased!
We must find a way to purify the corrupted land. But I do not know how.{nl}Even Dievdirbys Widas could not come up with any plan for purifying the land.{nl}

Say, wouldn't one of the masters in Orsha know a way to purify the land?{nl}I would ask them myself but I am tied up at the moment...{nl}Will you please visit the masters in Orsha and see if they have any ideas?
Orsha Master
Ah... You are looking for a way to purify the land?{nl}How could I say no to that face.{nl}I will get you Purification Scroll.
There must be a master in Orsha who knows a way to purify the land!{nl}There must be...
Woah! A Purification Scroll?{nl}That's perfect! Thank you so much!

While you, the Revelator, was away in Orsha, I looked around.{nl}The demon totems erected throughout the land are corrupting the land.{nl}The demons are guarding them, so couldn't approach them...{nl}
Could I ask you to destroy the totems and use the Purification Scroll on the corrupted spot?
I wonder how strong the evil energy is... seeing even the ferrets have been affected by it.
Oh thank you so much! I really needed your help!{nl}When the temple is built, please do come and visit me!
We were just about to lose all hope for our town...{nl}You truly are a savior... I cannot thank you enough!{nl}

It is time for us to rebuild the temple altogether.{nl}I searched for the right place and found a perfect spot up there. It's rich with life force.{nl}Demons approached me so I did not have much time to inspect it more carefully. It matters not,{nl}I do believe that Goddess Lada will recover her strength faster, if she rests in that place.{nl}

I shall give you Earth's Flower Seed.{nl}This flower takes the energy of the soil to grow. {nl}Inside the flower, the life force gathers. When the flower with rich life force blossoms!{nl}Please, take it to Goddess Lada.
I have never felt such a great amount of life force... {nl}A temple with hot springs would be very prof...{nl}
...Hmm?{nl}Ah, nevermind what I just said, I was just talking to myself. {nl}It was nothing, really. Forget about it...
Goddess Lada

Even if it happened in accordance with Laima's prophecy, {nl}I have fallen and left the townspeople helpless and worried...{nl}My gratitude cannot be expressed through mere words... {nl}And this flower is filled with great life force...{nl}My recovery won't take long with this. Again, I deeply thank you...
(The girl is looking at the strangely glowing sapling without a word.)
(And she, with a flash of light, disappears.)
Rescue the villagers and then search for the Light of Salvation

Speak with Mardas
Mardas seems to be chased by something. Listen to what Mardas has got to say.
Inspect the Spot Infested With Demons
Mardas explains that he was being chased by the demons. He asked you to check whether they are still on the hunt or not.
You saw the monsters using the Owl Sculpture to send a light bead. Ask what Mardas knows about it.
Ask Mardas whether he has seen the light bead sent from the Owl Sculpture.
Follow the light bead from the Owl Sculpture
Mardas says that the demons are gathering the light bead and getting them to somewhere else. Follow the light bead.
Move up the hill to follow the light bead
The light bead was sent to another Owl Sculpture on the hill. Go up the hill and do not lose track...
Saved the Owl Chief Sculture. It seems that it is capable of talking. Listen to what it says.
The Owl Chief Sculpture, unlike the others, is in its right mind. Ask if it remembers what happened to Karolis Springs.
Search for the Karolis Springs Crystal

In order to save other Owl Sculptures from the demon's influence, the Karolis Forest needs to be revived. Restoring the Karolis Altar is the first step. Use the Guide Owl's Will to locate the Karolis Altar Crystal.
Retrieve Karolis Altar Fragments from monsters
The monsters have the fragments from the broken Karolis Altar. Defeat the monsters that have the fragments and collect them all.
Teleport to the Spot where Karolis Altar Used to Be
Go to the spot where the Karolis Altar used to be.
Restore the altar on the remains of the altar.
Report to the Owl Chief
Restored the altar. Report back to Owl Chief.
It is not enough to revive the Karolis Springs back to life. Speak with Owl Chief further.
Illuminate Karolis' light
Karolis' Lights around the altar must be lighted in order to restore the altar's power. There are four lights and they get extinguished in a short period of time. So, be haste.
Restored the altar. Report back to the Owl Chief.
The Altar is restored. Ask the Owl Chief if it worked.
Collect the power of the Owl Sculptures
The Owl Chief Sculpture says that to ensure the utter destruction of the Mind Control Tower, the collected power from the Owl Sculptures are needed. Find the owl sculptures and get their power.
Collected all the power from the owl sculptures. Report back to the Owl Chief.
Even collected the power from the owl chief sculpture. Speak with the Owl Chief Sculpture.
Destroy the Mind Control Tower
Destroy the Mind Control Tower with the power of the Owl Sculptures.
The Mind Control Tower has been destroyed. Return to the Owl Chief Sculpture.
Mardas is standing beside the Owl Chief Sculpture. Ask him about what they are discussing.
Speak with the Owl Chief Sculpture again
The Owl Chief Sculpture says that it will think of a plan after listening to what Mardas has to say. Meanwhile, ask what you should you do.
The Owl Sculpture is currently coming up with a plan to solve the problem caused by the demons based on the story from Mardas. Ask what you should do while they are discussing.
Collect the Energy of Karolis Springs
Go to the spot where it is said to be the hot spot for the energy and collect the said energy.
Destroy the Tombstones of Nestopa
Destroy the Tombstone of Nestopa
You see the tombstone of Nestopa, about which Albinas has talked, over there. Just like Albinas has told you, it looked very corrupted. Destroy it at once.
The tombstone of Nestopa certainly is corrupted. Quickly, destroy it.
Check the destroyed tombstone
Destroyed the tombstone like Albinas has told you to. Check it again.
Destroyed the tombstone just like Albinas told you to. Now, go back to Albinas.
On your way back to Albinas, someone appears. Perhaps, the maker of the tombstone? Talk with him.
A man appears as soon as the tombstone is destroyed. Who could it possibly be? Speak with him.

Damijonas furiously explains that the tombstones are not corrupted. The reason for their red aura is that it is protection against those with ill will. When a person with malicious intents touches it, the aura attracts nearby monsters. The man demands to know who spread such false accusations. It is for the best to go to Albinas, explain the situation and bring him back to here.
Albinas is not in the place he was before. Return to Damijonas and explain the situation.
Explain yourself
Damijonas is still furious about the fact that the tombstones are destroyed. Perhaps, listening to what he has to say and let him release all his anger until he calms down a bit. Talk to Damijonas.
The scolding from Damijonas was a long and harsh one. But it's finished now. Ask him what you can do.
Restoring the Tombstone
Tell Damijonas, you will restore the tombstone.
Obtain some stones that can be used to restore the tombstone, bring them to Nestos Camp. They will turn them into the materials for the restoration
Now, ask Gedas what would be the final step.
Deliver the News to Eduinas
You need to tell Eduinas what happened so far. Go to Eduinas.
Tell Damijonas what you know
Finally, go talk to Damijonas the tombkeeper.
Meet with Leopoldas of the Kedoran Merchant Alliance.
Speak with Leopoldas, the new recruit manager.

Serapinas is in charge of Public Relation. Now, find a player on the field, use the Kedoran Merchant Alliance Scroll on him or her. You and the audience will get Kedoran Merchant Alliance Benefits. If you or the other party a) already had gotten the benefits previously or b) Over Level 10, the benefits will not apply. The scroll's cooldown is not precisely short so be sure to check their level and the fact whether they have been informed previously.
You've completed promoting for Kedoran Merchant Alliance. Go back to Serapinas.
Lost and Found
Find Edita
Go and find Edita.
Find stuff that the lost Merchant Alliance items
Go to the spot Edita has pointed to and retrieve the items that were lost during Medzio Diena by the Merchant Alliance. And if possible, slice up the monsters you meet along the way.
Talk with Edita
Secured the thing Edita was talking about. Give it back to Edita.
Taking Out the Trash On Your Way There
Ask Edita if there is anything else she wants me to do.
Defeat the monsters and retrieve the items
The monsters are already infesting the area where the items are supposed to be. Teach them a lesson and retrieve the goods.
You have got the goods but to know what they are, you should consult with Jurate.
Listen more details about the retrieval of the goods.
Inspect the areas where the goods may be
Use the detector Edita to search the area. Use it in the area marked on the map.
Report to Edita
Successfully retrieved the goods all thanks to the goods. Deliver them to Eidta.
Educational Materials of the Kedoran Merchant Alliance
Go visit Margellius who is inj charge of records. He seems he needs some help.
Retrieve the Educational Materials
Get the Kedoran Merchant Alliance Educational Materials back from the monsters.
Got all the educational materials. Bring them to Margellius.
Educational Guidelines of the Kedoran Merchant Alliance
Ask Margellius if there is anything else you could help.

To make educational materials, a special dye is needed. To make that dye, you need some fresh body fluid from the monsters. When you put the traps Margellius gave near the monsters, the monsters will get caught allowing you to obtain the body fluid. Remember the monsters will die quickly when they get caught by the traps so you should pull them out fast. Only the monsters far in the town square, better get there.
Erecting the Tombstone
Finding Materials For the Tombstone
Nestopa is silently doing their work in Fasika Plateau and in this place. One of them, Antanas, what she does is erecting tombstones. Help her by bringing the neccearry materials to her.
You've obtained all the necessary materials for erecting tombstones. Now, go back to Antanas.
Ask her if, now with all the necessary materials, she could make tombstones.
Follow her instruction and build a tombstone with the materials you have.
You erected well. Say farewell to Antanas and go on your way.
Now, talk to Giedra.
Lost Sign
Go to Kestas, another member of Nestopa.
Retrieve Nesto's Sign
Retrieve the Nesto's Signs from the nearby monsters and give them back to troubled Kestas.
Giving the Sign Back
Got enough signs. Bring them back to Kestas.
Kill those monsters. They are after the signs.
Talk further with Kestas.
Defeat the monsters that are after getting the records
Speak with Grave Robber Amanda in the habitants' area
What you found in the secret area is a strange scroll. Move back to the habitants' area and talk with Amanda again.
The chest, the one Amanda saw, with a special power hidden inside was actually containing demons inside. Defeat the incoming demons first.
The oncoming wave of demons have fallen. Talk with Amanda again.
Amanda becomes increasingly nervous after her monocle produces no useful result. Speak with Amanda.
Amanda suggests to split out to look for the special power. Defeat the demons in the Bingcoolers Path area and look for the special power.
Nothing unusual here. Return to Amanda.
All work and no fruit. Speak with Amanda again
Search the Leima Small Square
Amanda says she saw something great in the Leima Small Square. Find out what she saw.
Only an old manager was in the Leima Small Square. Ask the Old Manager about what is happening.
The Old Manager is happy to help you on the quest to find the revelation. Speak with the Old Manager again.
Collect Mushrooms

The Old Manager says that in order to get pass the traps he set up, one must a certification ticket. The ticket's main ingredient is mushrooms, while on your way there, speak with Amanda and report the situation to her.
Deliver to the Old Manager
You've told Amanda about what happened and gathered enough mushrooms. Give the mushrooms to the Old Manager.
To the Storage Quarter
You've collected enough mushrooms to make a certification ticket. Ask the Old Manager what's other gredients.
Collect Earth Crystals
The Old Manager says injecting spells into mushrooms is the next step but his old and withered body cannot use spells. Defeat the monsters and gather Earth Crystals, the perfect replacements.
You've gathered enough Earth Crystals. Give them to the Old Manager.
You finally have gotten the certification ticket that ensures safe access to the storage quarter. Speak to the Old Manager.
The Old Manager has left for the Storage Quarter and will be waiting for you there. This is the chance where you can leave a note for Amanda to make her own certification ticket.
Speak with the Old Manager in the Storage Quarter
Left the note safely. Go to the Old Manager in the Storage Quarter.
You've met with the Old Manager. Ask the Old Manager on what to do to get the revelation.
Collect Rajatad's Egg
The spirits from the age of Ruklys contain the knowledge of where the revelation is, but they are too violent to speak. Collect Rajatad's Egg to create the Restraint Token.
You've gotten the Rajatad's Egg. Deliver it to the Old Manager.
The next ingredient is needed. Speak with the Old Manager again.
Collect Demon Bones
The Restraint Token that will hold down the spirits and calm enough to talk. For that, you need to have demon bones. Defeat the demons and get their bones.
You've obtained the demon bones. Take them to the Old Manager.
You've completed the first step of making the Restraint Token. Ask the Old Manager about the second step.
Absorb the vitalities of demons with the Absorption Orb
The demon's vitality is needed to create the Restraint Token that will restrain the spirits. Place the Absorption Orb nearby demons to suck them dry.
Filled the orb with the life force of demons. Take it back to the Old Manager.
The Absorption Orb is complete. Talk to the Old Manager to read the memories of the spirits.
All the preparation for reading the memories of the spirits are done. Restrain the spirits with the Restraint Token and take them to the Old Manager.
The Old Manager has read their memories. Speak with him.
You are slowly putting pieces of puzzle together and gained a broader understanding of the revelation. Speak with the Old Manager again.
Bring the restrained spirit with the Restraint Token.
The Old Manager can now access to the deepest part of their memories. Bring the spirit back again by using the Restraint Token.
There are spirits who have been robbed the well-deserved eternal rests in the arms of the goddesses and dwelling the Fortress of the Land. Perhaps, a Dievdirbys Master can help.
The Dievdirbys Master seems to have a plan to lead the spirits. Speak with the Dievdirbys Master again.
Create an owl sculpture and lead the spirits
Install the owl sculpture in the Storage Quarter of the Fortress of the Land. After that, lead the lost spirits to the owl sculpture.
You've lead the lost spirits well. Report to the Dievdirbys Master.
Premier Eminent does not seem to be a human. To reveal his identity, speak with Amanda.
Inspect Premier Eminent with the monocle
Amanda asks you to see the real Premier Eminent for yourself. Use the monocle to find out the true identity of Premier Eminent.
Premier Eminent is a demon! Consult with Amanda on what to do.
Premier Eminent will be waiting for you. Speak with him to avoid any suspicion.
In order to repair the device destroyed by Ruklys, the parts are required. Search for the suitable parts from the defensive traps at the battle field on Ataka Side Road.
You've got all the parts you can get. Speak with Amanda before returning to Premier Eminent.
Amanda has been working on the ways of the magic circle so far. Speak with Amanda.
Collect Demon Blood
In order to activate the foundation stone, you must re-inscribe the letters with something that has spells in it. Firstly, collect the Demon Blood.
Inscribe the letters with the demon blood
You've collected enough demon blood. Inscribe the letters on the pillars of the foundation stones at the Slepti Watchtower.
You've activated the the foundation stones at the Slepti Watchtower. Ask Amanda what should we do next.
Destroy the Demon Totems
The foundation stones at the Ikveta Podium is not working properly due to the demon totems around them. Destroy the totems first.
Activate the Foundation Stones
You've destroyed the Demon Totem. Try to activate the foundation stones once again.
The defensive magic circle is active. Go back to Premier Eminent before he gets suspicious.
Defeat Mandara
The light from the device and the magic circle burns Premier Eminent! For now, defeat Mandara summoned by Premier Eminent!
Defeat Mandara summoned by Premier Eminent
