I can't believe the Demon Lord was defeated! {nl}And thanks to you the ferrets aren't stealing out food anymore.{nl}Thank you so much!
Thank you. I'm so grateful to you and to Goddess Lada for having sent you.{nl}You are a blessing to our village.
Huh, an outsider? You must be new here...{nl}Those ferrets may look cute, but they'll shred your face to pieces if you're not careful.
I don't know what the demons did to those ferrets but...{nl}Seeing how they attack, avoiding a fight must be impossible, right?
Finally that Demon Lord was defeated...{nl}And Goddess Lada was rescued... Thank you.{nl}
Thanks to you now we can focus on the ferrets.{nl}I still don't know about the red water, but we'll find an answer eventually.
I know it was Goddess Laima who sent us a Revelator, but...{nl}Still, I think everything worked out even better because of you.{nl}
I'm very thankful for everything.{nl}For saving me, and for rescuing Goddess Lada too.
Now that we know Goddess Lada is safe, I want to build a shrine with the villagers.{nl}I have faith that, with the power if the goddess, our river will become clear again. It will.
I never thought everything Goddess Laima predicted would become true.{nl}The disaster happening... even the Revelator coming to save us from it.{nl}
And yet the disaster happened, and now you saved our village and Goddess Lada.{nl}I should have been the one to keep the faith when our village was down, but I didn't.{nl}
So all of that work was in vain...{nl}Thank you for making me realize that before it was too late...
Thanks to you Goddess Lada is safe.{nl}She's lost her power now but... I know she'll get it back someday.{nl}
I know you'll do well no matter what path you chose.{nl}I've seen the miracles you're capable of with my own eyes.{nl}
Goddess Laima is leading you to be the savior of the world, I can tell.{nl}May your every step receive the blessing of the goddesses...
Our savior... The future of this world depends on your journey...{nl}Now go... Follow Laima's revelations and walk the path of salvation...
Hey, you.{nl}If you're going inside the shrine, can you give me a hand?{nl}
I need to go to where the villagers are but...{nl}I don't know, there's just so many monsters here.{nl}
It was hard enough coming all the way up here.{nl}And those no-good youngsters won't even come out to help an old man.{nl}
So you left me out, is it?{nl}You think you can sort out this red water problem all by yourselves?{nl}
Who do you take the village chief for? You lousy youngsters.{nl}
Anyway, since it came to this...{nl}If your skills are okay, will you take down some monsters?{nl}
Youngsters these days don't respect their elders anymore.{nl}What can they do by themselves?{nl}
Where's the respect for the village chief?
Yes, yes.{nl}You're much better than the youngsters in our village.{nl}
Seems like you're no nobody, hey?{nl}The young ones in our village can't kill monsters that easily.
Ugh, grandpa...{nl}How many times have I told you to stay at home? It's dangerous to go out on your own...{nl}
Thank you for looking after my grandfather.{nl}I heard you're very talented, is it?{nl}Anyway, if it's you... Hm...{nl}
We live in a village down from here.{nl}The water here runs all the way down to our village, you see.{nl}
One day, our crops started to grow a lot bigger than usual.{nl}Of course the village thought it was a blessing from the goddesses but... that didn't last long.{nl}
The crops were inedible. Every single one of them.{nl}The problem wasn't the taste, but everyone who ate them ended up bedridden, it was chaos.{nl}
On top of that, all the water in the village turned red.{nl}And just like the crops... No one could drink it anymore.{nl}
Eventually some people left for Orsha, thinking the village had been cursed...{nl}Those who stayed decided to follow the river and ended up here.{nl}
But even among all of us, we have no idea what to do.{nl}People are starting to grow tired, too...{nl}
My grandfather praised you to the skies, he's really impressed by your talent.{nl}That's why I'm asking you. Please help our village.{nl}
I'm sure you'll be able to find a solution if you just use some of your power.
Thank you for being so helpful.{nl}The first thing I want to ask of you is... to investigate the Wandering Sanctuary.{nl}
Not that long ago my grandfather went out there by himself.{nl}He ended up surrounded by monsters and... It was a close call.{nl}
There were a few objects strewn around that I'd never seen before.{nl}I think my grandfather was there to investigate them.
Found something in the heap of ashes.
I know I should take you there myself, but I feel like I'll just be a burden.{nl}That day, too, all we did was get grandpa and run away from there.
You're back.{nl}Did you see anything odd?{nl}
This... looks like a diary.{nl}I'll try and save whatever parts I can make out.{nl}
Meanwhile, could you look for my grandfather? {nl}The ground trembled all of a sudden and he went with some people from the village.{nl}
I asked them not to let him go anywhere...{nl}And now they take him with them, honestly.
Huh, what do you know.{nl}I owe you another one, eh? Thank you, thank you.{nl}
But this I know for sure.{nl}Something big is happening at the Wandering Sanctuary, I tell you.
You still can't find my grandfather?{nl}Sigh... If you do find him, make sure to bring him here.
This is it, this disc.{nl}You know how the ground trembled earlier?{nl}
The disc suddenly started glowing red so I followed it all the way here.{nl}I was chased away by monsters, but I clearly saw that it was pointing to something.{nl}
I'm going to give the disc to you; will you check where it's pointing to?{nl}My friend here got hurt so we're going to head back together.
My friend got hurt trying to protect me so we should stick together.{nl}Please do me this favor.
So the disc was pointing to this red statue? {nl}Hm... I've never seen this before.{nl}
Let me take a closer look at it, then.{nl}Who knows what else I'll be able to find.{nl}
I should go to the Absenta Reservoir.{nl}I remember Modis once said that there was a group of people in black hoods headed there.{nl}
Go see my granddaughter before you come along.{nl}She said something about a diary...?
experiment succeeded...{nl}... ...{nl}... results... protecting vessel is alive...{nl}...vina's power... Reservoir... spread... contaminate...{nl}
... ...{nl}...Seir Rainforest... Novaha Mona...{nl}... ...{nl}... annihilate... ...proceed with the pla...{nl}
Sigh, it wasn't easy. This is all I was able to recover.{nl}Almost all the pages are completely burnt.{nl}
All I understand is that...{nl}Some sort of power spread throughout the reservoir.{nl}
I wonder if that's why the water turned red, but I can't be sure...{nl}The vessel is alive... This part sounds strange, too.{nl}
I have no idea about the rest.{nl}Any guesses?
Anyway, enough with the diary...{nl}You should go and follow my grandfather to the Absenta Reservoir.
You're back?{nl}Ah, my granddaughter, all she does is worry about me.{nl}
Oh, of course.{nl}Can you tell me about what was in the diary?
I saw it.{nl}Before the water turned red, there were people praying here.{nl}
Those fools in the village think it was because of something else...{nl}But I'm convinced there are goddesses we don't know about.{nl}
The goddesses must have gotten angry because no one believes them.{nl}I'm sure offering them a tribute would appease them...{nl}
So I was thinking about offering them some monster meat.{nl}Would you help me?
The crops in our village were all contaminated by the red water so we can't eat them.{nl}I can't offer that to the goddesses, right?
You got it!{nl}Thank you so much for helping me.
I'm going to make an offering and pray to this obelisk.{nl}Oh, there's another obelisk somewhere.{nl}
I'll tell you where it is so you can go and pray there, yes?{nl}If we solve this I'm sure you'll be generously rewarded by our people.
The other obelisk is on the left side of the Vishikas Great Hall.{nl}I'll stay here and pray, then. You go now.
Have I made the offering, you ask?{nl}No, I only prayed so far... Why?{nl}
What? You mean the monsters suddenly ran to the offering?{nl}Huh?... That's impossible...{nl}
I'm sure I saw those people praying.{nl}They were wearing black hoods... I really saw them...{nl}
Hm... I'm confused.{nl}That's what I told everyone, what am I going to say now...
You didn't see a young man called Napalis, did you?{nl}He went out a while ago and hasn't been back since. I'm worried about him now.{nl}
He said he was headed to the Drava Chapel Lot.{nl}If you're going that way, would you mind checking in on him?
Why did he have to go out at a time like this.{nl}I sure hope nothing happened...
Napalis
You saved my life.{nl}I was being chased by that huge monster and had to hide in here.{nl}
I should go back to where the others are.{nl}Thank you so much for saving me!
Nothing... Nothing terrible happened, I hope?
Looking at that red water makes me feel terrible.{nl}It's not even good to drink... not to mention it ruined our crops.{nl}
The waste was monumental.{nl}Our vegetables grew huge, but they were all left to rot as we couldn't eat them.{nl}
Everyone in the village was ready to go out and find the reason why the water turned red, but...{nl}The only person who has actually fought any monsters is Modis, the hunter.{nl}
I saw you fight those monsters earlier and you were really good.{nl}If that's okay, will you clear out some monsters around here?
We should be fine if we just stick together...{nl}I hope we don't run into trouble on our way to the village.
So it was right, what I saw. I knew it.{nl}Thank you!{nl}
I still feel a little uneasy, though...
The ground trembling... it seems odd.{nl}I wonder if it's related to the experiment...{nl}
Oh, right, my grandfather! I forgot about him.{nl}Please go back to the Absenta Reservoir, I don't want him to get in trouble again.
A vessel? That's odd.{nl}Someone was doing an experiment here... is that what you mean?{nl}
Hm... I never heard about any demons doing any sort of experiments...{nl}But it could be related to those black hoods that Modis saw.{nl}
I told you I saw them walking in and out of the Nesuga Small Corridor.{nl}Would you look into it?
I hope we can find something this time, too.{nl}I don't think I can rest now that I know it was someone who did this.
So, did you find anything?{nl}A picture? What is it?{nl}
Let's see... This looks like that red statue you found earlier.{nl}By the way, while you were gone I saw something strange.{nl}
I was taking a closer look at that statue you brought and...{nl}Suddenly, the water on the bucket next to it turned red.{nl}
Oh... the smell.{nl}If something like this exists but much bigger, then that must be what's tainting the water.
Let's see, then... Where can we find something like this but big...{nl}If only we got rid of that, I'm sure the water will be back to normal.{nl}
Also, the monster drawn on the bottom here got me thinking.{nl}I feel like I know this monster, but it looks different somehow.
A Hydra... Go now!{nl}I'll be with you soon!
Did I... Did I see that right?{nl}It looked like it had some sort of gem on its body.{nl}
Hydras aren't usually that big, and their scales aren't red either.{nl}This monster... It looks exactly like the one on that painting you found.{nl}
People have called that monster a mystical creature since long ago, but this is different.
So that beast has a gem stuck on it now, huh?{nl}I'd say you'd have to get the beast out and kill it to get rid of the gem...{nl}
Talking is easy. Do you know why they call it mystical?{nl}You can't just go and grab it.{nl}
Hm... That's if we count only the folk from our village.{nl}If you help us catch it I think we might just have a chance. What do you say?
Right. Thank you.{nl}You want to talk to Modis, then.{nl}
He's the best hunter in the village. I'm sure Modis can think of a way to lure to beast.
Hunter Modis
So you're the one our village chief can't stop talking about.{nl}I'm really glad you decided to help us.
Hunting is all the same, no matter the size of the beast.{nl}We just lure it into a trap with some bait and then tie its feet.{nl}
Considering the size of this one, though, making the trap is going to take some time.{nl}Can you find some bait meanwhile?
For the bait you want to get some Black Sawpent meat.{nl}We need some herbs too, to disguise our scent.
If it wasn't for you, we would have never been able to deal with the Hydra.{nl}As you know most of us work as farmers.
Did you get everything?{nl}I was able to make a nice, sturdy trap.
We have a problem.{nl}One of the villagers went to see the chief and drank some water from the bucket.{nl}
I told them to be careful, that the water was probably contaminated, but...{nl}I wish we had some sort of painkiller... Can you please get some herbs for us?
This area is contaminated with the red water, you'll have to go to Svaigulys Hill in Letas Stream. {nl}Find some Markazi Flowers. They're yellow.{nl}
I wish we knew how to cure this.{nl}Right now all we can do is try and relieve the pain.
Oh, that's it.{nl}Let's hope our friend has learned their lesson now.
It's revolting to think that this red water is all because of some experiment.{nl}Because of it our lives have been threatened.{nl}
Why did the people in the black hoods do such a thing?{nl}I just want to burn down the whole laboratory so they can't even think of doing it again.{nl}
Thing is... I can't fight the monsters and burn down the lab on my own.{nl}Our people want to leave as fast as possible.
Why on earth would someone do an experiment like that?{nl}It's atrocious.
Thank you.{nl}This should be enough to make the oil we need!
Now, pour the oil around the laboratory and set it on fire.{nl}I hope this teaches them not to do another experiment here...{nl}
So one of the laboratories is here at the Nesuga Small Corridor.{nl}There's another one in the Wandering Sanctuary at the Pelke Shrine Ruins.
Those filthy people...{nl}Next time I see the black hoods I need to have a word with them.
Thank you.{nl}That makes me feel better.{nl}
How can someone think of such a cruel experiment?{nl}How can they even... Am I right?
Go see Modis.{nl}He's an expert at setting straps, you know.
I set up the trap at the Heralve Vacant Lot. {nl}With the bait on it we should be able to catch the Hydra.{nl}
Make sure you're ready for this, that beast is dangerous.{nl}
I sure hope we're right after all.{nl}
You're the only one we can trust now.{nl}I pray that the goddesses give us strength...
You're back! How did it go?{nl}Did you destroy the gem?{nl}
Good, good! Very good.{nl}That red statue you brought earlier suddenly exploded, gave me quite the scare.{nl}
I don't expect the water to turn back to normal right away.{nl}It's going to take a while for all this water to become clean again.{nl}
But things are getting better, I'm sure those who went to Orsha will come back.{nl}You really were a savior to our village!{nl}
You're leaving already?{nl}Alright, just make sure you stay away from Delmore Castle.{nl}
I heard from one of our youngsters who went there...{nl}Apparently it's completely deserted and swarming with demons.{nl}
Seems like they followed Orsha's immigration order, huh?{nl}No use in going to a place that's just full of demons.{nl}
Anyway, thank you for everything.{nl}May the goddesses bless every step you take...
The water's bright red, we can't drink it.{nl}And those darned youngsters don't even come out to help an old man.
Isn't it weird? All the red water around here.{nl}Don't drink it, though. It'll make you sick to your stomach.
The others don't seem to understand.{nl}It's clear the goddesses are upset.
I'm also worried about the red water, and there's all these monsters around.{nl}Should I have just gone to Orsha...?
We came here together to try and figure out this red water, but...{nl}It's too dangerous out here...
Thank you so much for saving me.{nl}I should have stopped our chief... It was my mistake.
This is the reservoir where the river begins.{nl}I think the source of the contamination might be somewhere around here.
We need to find it and eliminate it as soon as possible.{nl}Otherwise our village is doomed.
You went out there without me again, did you?{nl}We could have gone together if you'd just waited a little while.{nl}
I'm going to give you the diary, but first let me explain what it says.{nl}Just take note of this and go find my grandfather right away.
Just a while ago here I was, thinking I'm done for, unable to escape...{nl}Thinking about it, our chief must be a really brave man...
(The ground is suddenly trembling.)
Hm?{nl}What's this trembling?{nl}
Something's going on, for sure.{nl}The stream in our village, all our water is bright red.{nl}
Drinking the water makes people sick as a dog...{nl}Medzio Diena was hard enough on us, now this happens.{nl}
You there.{nl}I could use a little help from you.{nl}
The young ones is our village do nothing but give excuses to keep me out of their plans. {nl}They wouldn't even know about the reservoir if it wasn't for me!{nl}
But, see, if someone talented like you can take me there...{nl}I can teach them not to disrespect their village chief.{nl}
What do you say? I'll make it up to you, eh? {nl}Come to the Collapsed Hall Lot if you agree.
Hunter Modis
You mean you defeated the Hydra?{nl}Wow, your skills are impressive.{nl}
Hurry and go see the village chief.{nl}This is the best news we've had since after Medzio Diena.
It's a shame for the people in our village...{nl}If the goddesses aren't upset, then what is it?{nl}
Ah, yes. You came.{nl}You're here to help me, yes?{nl}
I knew they'd be like this.{nl}The ground shakes a little, they start to panic.{nl}Asking why I even bothered to come here and such. Eh...
First, go see my granddaughter.{nl}I told her good things about you; I'm counting on you.
Hey!{nl}Stop wandering around and run, now!{nl}This place is full of demons!
I was running away from the demons in the Delmore Castle and ended up here.{nl}If you don't want them to get you, you need to run, now!
I don't want to stay here either.{nl}I'm just going to rest for a while and leave right away.
I can't tell if you're brave or just reckless...{nl}I feel like I'm in danger just being around you.
I have nothing left to lose.{nl}I don't want to run away anymore.{nl}
Please, I beg you.{nl}I don't want to see the Divine Tree take the spirits of our people...
I cannot let the demons get me but...
I don't know how much longer I can hold on...
With my knowledge of demons and the things Mardas saw, {nl}we might just be able to find a solution.{nl}I'm counting on you not to let our souls be taken by the Divine Tree.
Thank you for saving this forest.{nl}I'll take care of the spirits that escaped and make sure they find their way back to the goddess.{nl}
And that red gem Mardas saw...{nl}It must be somehow connected to what happened to the spirits.{nl}
From what I heard the water at the Pelke Shrine Ruins turned red...{nl}I wonder if that has something to do with that gem?
(There is no reaction.)
You should go see a man named Mardas.{nl}I'm sure he has the answer.
Please talk to our Owl Chief about it as well.{nl}I'm certain it will be a pleasure to meet you.
Thank you for saving me.{nl}I hope my power will be of use to you, even if by only a little...
That was unbearable...{nl}If it wasn't for you I would've stayed like that forever.
I'll do anything, if only I can stand up to the demons.{nl}Thank you for saving me!
I'm still a bit confused.{nl}I just can't believe what I was doing.
To think I was helping the demons instead of guiding spirits to the goddess...{nl}I feel terrible, even if that wasn't my intention.
How sad is the Dievdirbys who made us going to be when they find out...?{nl}I need to be more focused from now on...
Thank you so much for saving me.{nl}I feel so sorry to our Owl Chief...
It's close to the Anga Hall.{nl}I'm glad you're not going out there on your own, but I have a bad feeling about this.
The water all turned red, you can't get any around here.{nl}You need to go all the way to Letas Stream.{nl}
If you go to Svaigulys Hill, on the right side you'll see some yellow flowers.{nl}They're Markazi Flowers, it's what we use in times of need.
Really?{nl}I knew we were on the same page.{nl}
The oil I have is not enough, though.{nl}First, I want to ask you to collect some Rajapearlite lard.
I wish this would make the water go back to normal...
If it goes well, tell the village chief immediately.{nl}May the goddesses bless you.
The waste was monumental.{nl}Our vegetables grew huge, but they were all left to rot as we couldn't eat them.{nl}
It's a huge relief.{nl}Thank you so much!
A food offering would probably appease the goddesses...{nl}But all our crops were ruined by the red water, how can we offer that?
The water should go back to normal now, right?{nl}That red water, the first time I saw it I was terrified...
I think we need to keep an eye on this place to keep things like this from happening again.
At first when our crops grew because of that red water everyone was delighted.{nl}We thought it was a blessing from the goddesses... Yet they were completely inedible.
Napalis said you saved them from a really close call.{nl}I'm glad they're back to safety, but I can't guarantee things like this won't happen again.
We all live in a village down from here.{nl}We came all the way here to try and see what's making the water... like this.
I'm telling you, I saw people praying.{nl}They wore black hoods... I really saw them...
Oh... So it was the gem on the Hydra that turned our water red.{nl}What could this gem be, to cause so much trouble...?
What do you know, there's a gem on the beast.{nl}Anyway, with you and Modis here... destroying it won't be impossible.
So the monster on the painting you brought in was a Hydra...{nl}And because of this one thing now we have this chaos from our village all the way to Zeraha.
It will be a while before the water turns back to normal.{nl}But when it does, the people who went to Orsha should come back...
I know the water is going to be fine now...{nl}But it's a shame we still don't know who did this or why they did it.
I do remember seeing some people with black hoods here doing something a while ago.{nl}To think that they're responsible for all of this... It's horrible.
So the water turning red was because of that gem on the Hydra...{nl}It might have been mystical, but that was a long time ago.{nl}
We're on the spot now, how and where do we even start...?
Well, the Hydra may be a mystical creature, but it's no different from other game.{nl}The only difference is the size, and that weird gem it has on its body.
I'd heard about the Hydra before, but I never realized how scary it was until now.{nl}To think you actually went and fought it... How impressive is that?
That red water is no one's business but our village's.{nl}Outsiders would do well to leave us alone.
I'm sorry I was rude to you earlier...{nl}Please forgive this old man's insolence.
May the Revelator who dreamt of chaos defeat the evil forces and bring light back into our world...{nl}If the legends are true, this red water will soon be no more.
I'm sorry. I can't really give you any details...{nl}Just go back and don't ask questions...
Quick, save the girl!{nl}We can't let Zaura have his way with this!
Those ferrets, they weren't like this...{nl}If we're being honest, this was all our fault though.

Check for requests at the Mercenary Post
Check for requests at the Mercenary Post.
Collect Monster Products
You have accepted Receptionist Donnes' request. Collect the items to complete it.
Mercenary Post Request Report
You have completed the request. Report back to Donnes at the Mercenary Post.
The materials for the test are ready. Go talk to the Linker Submaster to find out how the test is going to be carried out.

The Linker Submaster says that if you're really talented you should have the eyes to find the World Behind at Tenet Church 1F. Go into this world, find a book there and bring it to the Linker Submaster.
Give the book to the Linker Submaster
You found the book in the World Behind and successfully passed the test. As proof of this, take the book to the Linker Submaster.
This amount is not enough to offer the Cleric Master. Please collect 1,000 silver in donations to deliver to the Cleric Master.
You have collected 1,000 silver in donations for the Cleric Master. Deliver the donations to the Cleric Master in Klaipeda.
The book requested by the Quarrel Shooter Master belongs to the Hunter Master. Collect 1,000 silver to purchase the book from her.
You have enough silver to purchase the book. Obtain it from the Hunter Master for 1,000 silver and deliver it to the Quarrel Shooter Master.
The book requested by the Archer Master belongs to the Hunter Master. Collect 1,000 silver to purchase the book from her.
You have enough silver to purchase the book. Obtain it from the Hunter Master for 1,000 silver and deliver it to the Archer Master.
The book requested by the Ranger Master belongs to the Hunter Master. Collect 1,000 silver to purchase the book from her.
Go see the Hoplite Submaster at the West Siauliai Woods.
To the Hoplite Submaster, his most cherished spear is a source of pride. Enhance a piece of spear-type equipment up to level 6. Do this on any spear-type weapon.
Report the results to the Hoplite Submaster
You have enhanced a piece of spear-type equipment to level 6. Show it to the Hoplite Submaster.
Go to Siauliai Miners' Village and talk to the Psychokino Submaster.
The Psychokino Submaster is going to help you prove your skills, but she wants some demon essence in return. Defeat some Minotaurs Chapparitions at the Gate Route to obtain demon essence.
Deliver the essence to the Psychokino Submaster
You have obtained the essence of both demons. Deliver it to the Psychokino Submaster.
Talk to the Linker Submaster at Siauliai Miners' Village.
Duel the Linker Submaster
The Linker Master wants to test the quality of mana through dueling. Duel against the Linker Master and win.
You can feel the quality of mana enhanced after dueling with the Linker Master. Talk to the Linker Master.
Talk to the Wugushi Submaster
Go to the Gateway of the Great King and talk to the Wugushi Submaster.
Duel the Wugushi Submaster
The Wugushi Master says that even if cowardly, the last one standing is the true winner of the combat. Duel with the Wugushi Master.
You have defeated the Wugushi Submaster in a duel. Go talk to the Wugushi Submaster again.
Talk to the Rodelero Submaster
Go to the Gateway of the Great King and talk to the Rodelero Submaster.
The Rodelero Submaster asked for a shield enhanced to level 4. Enhance a shield-type piece of equipment and show it to the Rodelero Submaster.
Report to the Rodelero Submaster
You sucessfully enhanced a shield-type piece of equipment to level 4. Report to the Rodelero Submaster.
Talk to the Elementalist Submaster
Go to Akmens Ridge and talk to the Elementalist Submaster.
Complete the Elementalist Submaster's task
Relay the task to the Elementalist Submaster
You have successfully completed the Elementalist Submaster's task. Deliver the collected materials to the Elementalist Submaster.
Talk to the Cataphract Submaster
Go to the Gateway of the Great King and talk to the Cataphract Submaster.
Defeat Sparnasman around the Vieta Gorge to prove your skills to the Cataphract Submaster.
Report to the Cataphract Submaster
You successfully defeated Sparnasman. Report to the Cataphract Submaster.
Defeat Sparnasman
Defeat Boowooks near a Royal Cube to absorb
The Officer's Spirit is trying to make a human figure by tying the wooden legs. Let's collect rustling skins from Old Kepas.
Defeat the monster chasing Toby
The Archer Master wants to see whether you have what it takes to keep learning. Go to Crystal Mine 1F and collect the wings of Bats.

As Follower Rikke said, after setting fire to the Panto Totem, the Pantos started taking orders. They helped defeat the Big Panto Spearman and the Old Talisman seems like it could be of use. Tell this to Rikke.
Vincent is lazy and asked you to do his work for him. Finish the forgeries as he told you to. Blue smoke will appear when the forgery is complete in the mold.
Investigate the Red Energy
Some areas in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F are glowing with an eery red energy. Go and have a look at them.
Defeat Cerberus
Cerberus was called out by the red energy and broke free! Defeat it.
Investigate Bastymosi Field
Mardas told you to run because the surrounding areas are filled with demons. Go to Bastymosi Field and see what's really happening.
The monsters seem to be using the Owl Sculptures to send the light beads to somewhere. Ask Mardas if he knows anything about it.
Ask Mardas if he's ever seen the Owl Sculptures sending light beads anywhere.
Follow the light bead to Bonewide Cliff
The light beads were delivered to the Owl Sculptures on top of a slope. Turn around and follow them to Bonewide Cliff.
Retrieve the Karolis Altar Crystal

To save the Owl Sculptures possessed by the demons you must restore the energy of Karolis Forest. To do that, you'll have to reconstruct the Karolis Altar destroyed by the demons. Follow the will of the leading owls and find the Karolis Altar Crystal.
To spread out the forest's divine force, you need to find and light up all of Karolis' light rays. Hurry and light up all four of Karolis' rays before their light dies out.
Destroy the Mind Control Tower at Duoklu Hall
Destroy the Mind Control Tower at Duoklu Hall with the power of the Owl Sculptures.
Mardas is with the Owl Chief Sculpture. Listen to what he was saying.
To save the Guide Owl Sculptures at Letas Stream, go to the birthplace of Karolis, where the energy of Karolis Springs is stronger, and collect that energy.
Find the Guide Owl Sculpture at Letas Stream
The Owl Chief Sculpture requested you gather the energy of Karolis Springs and deliver it to the Guide Owl Sculptures. Go find the Guide Owl Sculptures.
The Owl Chief Sculpture requested a divine branch of Letas in order to defeat the demons. Use the crystal containing the energy of Karolis Springs to find the holy tree of Letas and obtain a branch.
Mardas seems to have finally found a solution after discussing with the Owl Chief Sculpture. Listen to what Mardas has to say.
Clear out the evil energy contaminating the forest
The first thing to do is eliminate the evil energy contaminating the forest. Set up the Namott of Suppression around the evil energy to clear it out.
You have cleared out all of the evil energy. Go back to Mardas and tell him about it.
You have eliminated all of the evil energy. Talk to Mardas about what to do next.
Remove the Surveillance Sphere Magic Circle

Mardas says you need to remove the magic circle keeping the Surveillance Spheres in order to access the black energy that's absorbing the forest's own energy. Avoid the Surveillance Spheres and destroy its magic circle.
Remove the Black Energy
At the end of the forked roads at Senyvas Yard, destroy the black energy that's absorbing the forest's own energy.
The black energy has been completely removed. Go and tell Mardas.
Remove all magic circles protecting the Soul Starvation

Mardas says the magic circles protecting Soul Starvation must be removed. The circles must be removed in the correct order, or they will become active again. Control each circle to figure out the order and remove them accordingly.
Remove the magic circles protecting the Soul Starvation
Destroy the Soul Starvation with the Namott of Suppression
You have defeated all the demons around. Use the power of the Namott of Suppression to destroy Soul Starvation.
Defeat monsters to supply magic to the Locked Chest
The chest is locked with an unknown force. Defeat some monsters around it to fill the chest with magic.
You defeated the monsters in the Woods of the Linked Bridges. Go see the Wizard Submaster.
Defeat monsters with the Fire Energy Bead
The Pyromancer Submaster wants to test your affinity with fire energy. Defeat some monsters while under the magic of the Pyromancer Submaster.
You have defeated the monsters. Go and ask the Pyromancer Submaster to evaluate your affinity with fire.
Defeat monsters and replenish the Magical Piece of Ice
The Cryomancer Submaster believes that every Cryomaster needs a talent for frost magic. To prove yourself, fill the unmelting magical piece of ice with magic.
You have replenished the magical piece of ice without letting it melt. Go back to the Cryomancer Submaster.
The Archer Submaster believes that being able to aim at an enemy from afar is important. Attack monsters by hitting them from a distance.
The Archer Submaster should be satisfied with your perfomance. Go back to the Archer Submaster.
The Ranger Submaster believes that the ability to fight multiple foes is what sets Rangers apart. Defeat a monster within 10 seconds after having defeated another.
Your performance was good enough to impress the Ranger Submaster. Go back to the Ranger Submaster.
Achieve Lv. 1 enhancement on a crossbow
The Quarrel Shooter Submaster mentioned the importance of your weapon. Bring her a crossbow-type equipment enhanced to level 1.
You have obtained a crossbow enhanced to level 1 or higher. Go see the Quarrel Shooter Submaster.
You have listened to the advice of all the Wizard Masters in Orsha. Go back to the Wizard Submaster.
Defeat monsters nearby the Condensed Firestone
The energy of fire feels a little stronger now. Go back to the Pyromancer Submaster.
The Cyomancer Submaster believes you need to become more familiar with handling frost. Use the Frost Tome and defeat the monsters with increased ice property resistance.
You have completed your training. Go back to the Cryomancer Submaster.
Blow away monsters using the Psychokino Scroll
The Psychokino Master believes that instead of a lecture you should see the power of the Psychokino with your own eyes. Use the Psychokino Scroll to blow away monsters.
You are now aware of how it feels to use Psychokino magic. Go back to the Psychokino Master.

According to the Linker Master, the magic of the Linkers starts with finding how to connect to your foe. She believes you can learn with practice, so attack monsters and try to find their point of connection.
The point of connection was there, even if briefly. Go back to the Linker Master.
Your test ends here. Go back and see the Archer Submaster.
Collect Wall Restoration Stones
The Ranger Submaster hopes that Rangers can help the people of Orsha by contributing to the city's reconstruction. Find some hard building stone in Koru Jungle and collect wall restoration stones.
You seem to have enough stones now. Go back to the Ranger Submaster.
Obtain Sticky Plant Sap from Plant-type monsters

The Quarrel Master requested you collect some material to join the wall restoration stones. Defeat plant-type monsters to obtain their sticky sap. The stronger the plant-type monster, the higher the chances of obtaining sap.
You have collected enough Sticky Plant Saps. Go back to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster.
Collect Sturdy Research Stones
The Sapper Submaster is researching new Sapper techniques. Go to Koru Jungle and find some sturdy stones for research.
You have collected enough sturdy stones. Go back to the Sapper Submaster.
The Hunter Submaster should be convinced by your performance. Go back to the Hunter Submaster.
You have defeated enough fire property monsters. Go back to the Pyromancer Submaster.
You have completed the test. Go back to the Cryomancer Submaster.
The Psychokino Master wants to test your ability to stay on top of the situation. Use the Spell Detector Orb and defeat monsters within its reach.
The Psychokino Master will be happy with your performance. Go back to the Psychokino Master.
Defeat monsters to collect Spiritual Energy
The Linker Master is researching ways to connect not only to mana, but also to the spirit. To help with her research, defeat monsters and fill the Soul Flask with spiritual energy.
The Soul Flask is now full of spiritual energy. Go back to the Linker Master.
You have defeated monsters of all types. Go back to the Thaumaturge Submaster.
Defeat Necroventer at Carlyle's Mausoleum
The Ranger Submaster wants to test your skills. Go to Carlyle's Mausoleum and defeat the Necroventer there to prove yourself.
You have defeated the Necroventer. Go back to the Ranger Submaster.
Achieve Lv. 5 enhancement on a shield
The Quarrel Shooter Submaster believes Quarrel Shooters, as shield users, should also invest in a proper shield. As instructed, obtain a shield enhanced to level 5.
You have obtained a shield enhanced to level 5 or higher. Go back to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster and show her your shield.
Collect Gun Powder from monsters at Delmore Outskirts
The Sapper Submaster wants to create a more powerful bomb for Sapper techniques. Defeat the monsters in the outskirts of Delmore and obtain the gun powder needed for making a poweful bomb.
You have obtained enough gun powder. Go back to the Sapper Submaster.
Defeat monsters to obtain %s
The Hunter Submaster has prepared a Hunter test for you. Go to Delmore Hamlet, Delmore Manor and Delmore Outskirts and find a box containing a Hunter's Pass in each location.
You have found all Hunter Passes. Return to the Hunter Submaster.
Collect poison from monsters in the Poison Bottle
The Wugushi Master believes the first thing to learn is the proper way to collect poison. Use the Wugushi Poison Bottle to collect poison from monsters at Carlyle's Mausoleum.
The poison bottle is full. Go back to the Wugushi Master.

The Scout Submaster demands most of all speed and agility from any hopeful Scout. Try attacking some monsters without receiving any damage. If you receive damage from a monster, the test will start all over again.
You seem to have proved your skills now. Go back to the Scout Submaster.
Talk to the Swordsman Submaster in Orsha
Learn the attributes and talk to the Swordsman Submaster
Talk to the Wizard Submaster in Orsha
Learn the attributes and talk to the Wizard Submaster
Talk to the Archer Submaster in Orsha
Learn the attributes and talk to the Archer Submaster
Talk to the Cleric Submaster in Orsha
Learn the attributes and talk to the Cleric Submaster
Defeat monsters to obtain the key
The box is locked and cannot be opened. Defeat nearby monsters to find the key.
You have obtained the key from the monsters. Try and open the locked box again.
Defeat nearby monsters to obtain %s
Put down Horacius' poison pot and collect some poison. The pot can only collect poison when there are monsters around.
The pillar collapsed without even having been touched. It needs to be repaired; collect some viscous liquid from nearby Desert Chupacabras.
Obtain %s from Desert Chupacabras

Helping Gedas seems bound to get you some information on Albinas. Retrieve Gedas' research materials from nearby Ticens. If a Ticen can be checked using the Space Bar, it is probably carrying a lot more materials.
Collect Flammable Powder

Gedas says he will have his allies investigate Albinas. They want to make flares, in case any of the allies is in danger, and they asked you to gather the materials. Obtain some flammable powder from monsters in order to make the flares.
You have collected enough flammable powder. Return to Gedas.
Obtain Flammable Powder
Ask Gedas about the flares and his research.
Find Merrisa
Go find Merrisa.
Merrisa requested you recover the lost holy relics in Goanar Path. Clear out some monsters on your way there.
Deliver to Merrisa
You have cleared out the monsters and recovered the holy relics. Take them to Merrisa.
Talk to Merrisa
Ask Merrisa if you can help with anything else.
You have recovered the Merchant Alliance's objects. Go and ask Merrisa what they are.
Defeat Infroburks to retrieve %s
Defeat Infroburks and retrieve the Damp Pieces of Paper
Use Merrisa's detector to investigate the Juikas Field area. Use the detector on the areas shown on the map to check your direction.
Report to Merrisa
You have found the Merchant Alliance's objects using the detector. Bring them to Merrisa.
Obtain Infroburk Body Fluid
A special ink is needed to make the educational materials. Set up Margellius' trap at the Drose Empty Lot and collect the body fluid of trapped Infroburks.
Defeat those trying to attack the spirits of the Klaipeda Market
Go to the Herb Gatherers' Cabin to save the merchants
Varas says his colleagues are hidden somewhere around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin. Save Varas' friends before the demons get to them.
Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose
You have found Rose, one of Varas' colleagues. Ask her what happened.
Defeat the demons threatening the merchants
Rose's Colleagues
Traveling Merchant Rose thanks you for saving her. Keep talking to her.
Give Laswi a Stamina Pill
Rose wants to go find her friends who are still scattered around the area, but Laswi is too tired to help. Give Laswi a Stamina pill.
You gave the Stamina pill to Rose. Will Laswi be okay now?
Laswi took the Stamina pill and seems to be feeling energized. Talk to Rose again to start finding her colleagues.
Find the merchants with Laswi
Have Laswi smell the merchants' clothes and follow their scent to find each one. When you find them, tell them of Rose's whereabouts.
Find the last Traveling Merchant
You have found 3 traveling merchants. Find the last missing merchant with Laswi.
Talk to Traveling Merchant Cassias
You have found all of Rose's merchant colleagues. Keep talking to Traveling Merchant Cassias.
Defeat the attacking demons
Traveling Merchant Cassias was about to go back when the demons started attacking. Defeat all of the attacking demons.
Report to Traveling Merchant Rose
You have defeated all attacking demons and Cassias will be safe back at the Herb Gatherers' Cabin. Return to the Herb Gatherers' Cabin and talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
Talk to Traveling Merchant Andres
Traveling Merchant Andres looks extremely restless. Talk to Traveling Merchant Andres.
Look for the Lost Package
Andres says he invested everything in his goods, but now they are lost. Look for Andres' goods at the Doholle Rest Place.
Deliver to Traveling Merchant Andres
You have found Traveling Merchant Andres' objects. Bring them back to Andres.
Talk to Traveling Merchant Gomez
Traveling Merchant Gomez seems anxious. Go and talk to him.
Defeat the monsters nearby Herb Gatherers' Cabin
Traveling Merchant Gomez is frightened by all the demons and monsters running wild. Defeat some monsters around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin to ease Gomez' anxiety.
Report to Traveling Merchant Gomez
The area around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin is safer now. Go and reassure Traveling Merchant Gomez.
Defeat the monsters nearby Herb Gatherers' Cabin
Injured Herbalist
Herbalist Tales is injured and collapsed onto the ground. Ask him if he is alright.
Collect Ronjia Grass at Nevaginga Hillside
Herbalist Tales requested you get some Ronjia Grass to use as a painkiller. Go to Nevaginga Hillside and collect Ronjia Grass.
Deliver to Herbalist Tales
You have collected enough Ronjia Grass. Deliver it to Herbalist Tales.
Herbalist Tales' injury doesn't seem to have gotten any better with just the Ronjia Grass. Talk to Tales again.
Tell the Cleric Master in Orsha about Herbalist Tales' symptoms
Herbalist Tales thinks the Cleric Submaster might know of a way to heal their injuries. Go see the Cleric Submaster in Orsha and tell them about Herbalist Tales' symptoms.
The Cleric Submaster believes Herbalist Tales might have been taken by evil energy. Ask the Cleric Submaster about what to do.
Deliver the medicine to Herbalist Tales
The Cleric Submaster gave you a medicine that can purify evil energy. Deliver the medicine to Herbalist Tales.
Where Did Everybody Go?
Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to Knidos Jungle
Rose wants to find the people of her village even if she has to do it alone, so she ran to Knidos Jungle. It's dangerous for her to go alone; follow her into the jungle.
Search in Croa Village to find out what happened
Like Rose said, the residents of the Croa Village are nowhere to be seen. Search the village and find out what happened.
They can't have moved, or there wouldn't be any household items left behind, and it wasn't an attack as there aren't any sings of struggle, only traces of something being dragged. Tell Rose.
Rose looks discouraged, but she seems to have found something. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose again.
Follow the beads on the ground
Rose says the beads belong to someone in the village called Anne, and that she would never leave them behind. It could be a lead; follow the trail beads on the ground.
The trail of beads ends here. Ask Traveling Merchant Rose what to do next.
Look for more beads or other clues
Traveling Merchant Rose believes there might be other beads nearby. Look around and search for more beads or other clues.
Talk to the person who is hiding
You have found someone hiding. They could be a village resident; try and talk to them.
Talk to Tess
Tess is terrified because of the demons. Try and talk to her first.
Tess was being chased by demons. Defeat the demons that chased her.
Return to to Tess and talk to her
You have defeated the demons that chased Tess. Go tell Rose and Tess that they are safe now.
Defeat the demons chasing Tess
Tess seems to be a resident of the Croa Village. Talk to her to find out what happened back at the village.
It seems the people of the Croa Village were taken by demons and dragged to the Novaha Monastery. Rose's brother was apparently taken to a different location. Talk to Rose.
Herbalist Ash is panting hard, talk to him
Defeat nearby demons
Herbalist Ash wants to go back to Orsha but is scared of all the demons around. Defeat some demons nearby for Herbalist Ash.
You have defeated some demons nearby. Return to Herbalist Ash.
Demon Herbalist
Herbalist Ash seems to be worried about something. Ask him what is wrong.
Collect the same herbs as the demon
Herbalist Ash says they saw an unusual sight: a demon collecting herbs. They want to know what those herbs were. Go to Neneva Yard and collect a type of herb with small, thin leaves.
Deliver to Herbalist Ash
You have found the herbs collected by the demon. Show them to Herbalist Ash.
Herbalist Ash's face froze after realizing the herbs collected by the demon were Aconite, a deadly poisonous type of herb. Talk to Herbalist Ash again.
Collect Loktanun Fluid
Herbalist Ash wants to dry out all the Aconite to prevent the demons from using it. First, catch some Loktanuns and collect their acidic fluid.
You have collected enough Loktanun Fluid. Return to Herbalist Ash.
You have collected enough Loktanun Fluid to dry out the Aconite. Talk to Herbalist Ash again.
Spray the Loktanun Fluid on the Aconite
Spraying the Loktanun Fluid on the Aconite should dry it out. Go to Neneva Yard and spray the Aconite with the collected Loktanun fluid.
All the Aconite in sight seems to have been sprayed. Report to Herbalist Ash.
Giant Bracken
Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to Dadan Jungle
Rose ran off to save the people of the Croa Village. Follow her into Dadan Jungle.
Find the demon laboratory and defeat the demons there
Traveling Merchant Rose saw a giant bracken attached to a device and thinks there might be a laboratory nearby. Find the demon laboratory and defeat the demons there.
Search for materials on the Giant Bracken
This laboratory seems to be related to the giant bracken. Look around and try to find any materials that might be related to it.
Deliver the diary to Traveling Merchant Rose
You have found a diary related to the giant bracken experiment. Give it to Rose.
Return to Rose and deliver the diary
Rescue Traveling Merchant Rose
Rose was captured by demons and an unknown wizard. Rescue Traveling Merchant Rose.
You have rescued Rose. Talk to her and see if she is alright.
Defeat the demons that tried to kidnap Rose
Traveling Merchant Rose seems to be alright now. Talk to her and figure out what to do next.
Find the Power Supply Device and remove the power source
In order to turn off the giant bracken device it's power source needs to be removed. Use the monsters to stop the freezing magic circles and remove the power source.
You have removed the power source of the experiment device. Tell Rose about it.
Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to the entrance of the Novaha Monastery
The device attached to the giant bracken seems to be out of the way now. Meet Rose at the Novaha Monastery Entrance.
Defeat the sentinel demons
Traveling Merchant Rose says there are demons guarding the entrance to the Novaha Monastery. Defeat the sentinel demons.
You have defeated all the demons at the entrance to the monastery. Talk to Rose.
Defeat the Gremlin guarding the monastery entrance
Talk to Herbalist Talas
Herbalist Talas is caught in a trap! Go talk to Herbalist Talas immediately.
Free Herbalist Talas from the trap
Herbalist Talas seems to have gotten caught in the trap while running away from demons. Release Talas from the trap.
You have removed the trap. Ask Herbalist Talas if he is alright.
Demon Cauldron
Herbalist Talas seems to be fine, fortunately. Ask Talas exactly what happened to him.
Remove the Protective Barrier around the Demon Cauldrons
Herbalist Talas saw the demons add a type of a poisonous plant to the cauldrons and tried to destroy them. Go to Ruivara Field and remove the demon cauldrons' protective barrier.
Destroy the Demon Cauldrons
You have turned off all the protection shield creation devices. Destroy the cauldrons.
You have destroyed all the cauldrons. Go back to Herbalist Talas.
It looks like Herbalist Talas still has something to say. Keep talking to Talas.
Set the boxes on fire with the Poisonous Herbs
Herbalist Talas wants to burn the demons' materials to prevent them from restarting their operation. Go to the Saloto Lowland and burn down the demons' boxes of poisonous herbs.
Report to Herbalist Talas
You have burned down all the boxes with poisonous herbs. Return to Talas.
The Rescue
Follow Rose into the Novaha Monastery
The demons guarding the entrance to the monastery have been defeated. Follow Rose inside the Novaha Monastery.
Talk to the people of the Croa Village
The residents of the Croa Village seem to be locked inside the Special Reading Room. Ask the residents if they know a solution.
The village residents say the Novaha Monastery monks might know a way, but they saw one of them being dragged by demons earlier. Relay this information to Rose.
Rescue Monk Goss at the Ankel Small Corridor
Traveling Merchant Rose thinks it's best to rescue Monk Goss as the residents suggested. Head to the Ankel Small Corridor and rescue Monk Goss!
You have rescued Monk Goss. Check whether he is alright and ask him if he knows of a way to open the door to the Special Reading Room.
Monk Goss seems to have found a way to open the door. Talk to Monk Goss.
Obtain Green Apparition Essence
Monk Goss says the demons have created a magic circle which can only be opened by proving that you are a demon. This should be possible with some Green Apparition Essence.
Deliver to Monk Goss
You have collected enough Green Apparition Essences to use on the magic circle. Give it to Monk Goss.
Collect %s to prove that you are a demon
You have collected some Green Apparition Essences to prove that you are a demon. Ask Monk Goss about what to do next.
Protect Monk Goss until the door to the Special Reading Room is open
Monk Goss says opening the door is easy, although it does take some time. Protect Monk Goss while he opens the door to the Special Reading Room.
The door to the Special Reading Room is open! Talk to Monk Goss.
The door to the Special Reading Room is finally open. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
Traveling Merchant Rose thinks it's best for the village residents to run away immediately. Help the people escape to safety.
Talk to Rose at the Novaha Monastery entrance
Traveling Merchant Rose successfully helped the people of the Croa Village escape to safety. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
Defeat the attacking Mummyghast
Exhausted
Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis
Experiment Victim Tilis seems to be in terrible condition. Ask Tilis if there is anything you can help with.
Give a Stamina Recovery Potion
Tilis was a victim of terrible experiments and their body is in poor condition. Give a stamina recovery potion to Experiment Victim Tilis.
Experiment Victim Tilis seems to have recovered a little. Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis.
Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis
Experiment Victim Tilis seems to feel a little better after taking the potion. Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis.
Experiment Victim Tilis wants you to help them escape the monastery. Defeat any demons nearby.
Report to Experiment Victim Tilis
The surrounding areas seem safer now. Go and tell Experiment Victim Tilis about it.
Defeat the demons nearby
Talk to Experiment Victim Fils
Experiment Victim Fils has collapsed on the ground inside the monastery. Ask Fils if he is alright and talk to him.
Collect Experiment Victims' Relic
Experiment Victim Fils wants you to find the relics that belonged to the experiment victims who died. Go to the Raundona Circle Hall and collect the people's relics.
Deliver to Experiment Victim Fils
You seem to have found all of the people's relics. Bring them to Fils.
Rescue Edmundas
Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to the Novaha Annex
Now that the people of the Croa Village are safe, go and rescue Rose's brother. Follow Rose into the Novaha Annex and talk to her.
Search for Rose's brother, Edmundas
Traveling Merchant Rose went into hiding as the demons are after her. Search for the place where her brother Edmundas is being held captive in the Novaha Annex.
Rose's brother Edmundas is being held captive in the Apega State Chamber. Go back to Traveling Merchant Rose and tell her.
Follow Rose into the Apega State Chamber
Traveling Merchant Rose ran into the Apega State Chamber where her brother is being held captive. Talk to her inside the chamber.
Eliminate the cause of Edmundas' pain
Edmundas says a wizard came into the room, causing him to feel pain all of a sudden. Go to the inner section of the Apega State Chamber and destroy the thing that's hurting Edmundas.
You have destroyed all crystal pillars. Go back to Traveling Merchant Rose.
Edmundas is going to be fine now. Go and talk to Traveling Merchant Rose again.
Destroy the Mysterious Wizard's Magic Stone of Pain
As you were about to destroy the protective barrier around Edmundas, a mysterious wizard appeared and kidnapped Rose! Hurry and destroy the wizard's Magic Stone of Pain!
You have managed to rescue Edmundas, but Rose was taken away by the mysterious wizard. Talk to Edmundas to figure out what to do next.
Losing Rose has Edmundas devastated. Talk to him and find out a way to rescue Rose.
Find a way to release Edmundas from the shackles
Find a way to release Edmundas from the shackles in the State Chamber.
Edmundas is free from the shackles now. Go back to Edmundas.
The Experiment
Talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth
Experiment Victim Hilbeth is asking for help. Ask him what is wrong.
Search for Hilbeth's Backpack
Experiment Victim Hilbeth wants you to find his backpack of herbs. Go to the Tebeti Small Corridor and look for Hilbeth's backpack.
Deliver to Experiment Victim Hilbeth
You have found Hilbeth's Backpack. Give it back to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
Experiment Victim Hilbeth took the herbs in the backpack and seems to be feeling better now. Talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
Search the Collapsed Grand Corridor
Hilbeth's family are being victims of demon experiments at the Collapsed Grand Corridor and need to be rescued. Go there and investigate.
All you could gather were some objects found in a strange pile of bracken. Relay this to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
The objects you found at the Collapsed Grand Corridor were Hilbeth's family's belongings. Offer Hilbeth some words of comfort.
Destroy the remaining experiment facilities at the Errzze Oratorium
Experiment Victim Hilbeth wants to stop any kind of experiment from happening again. As requested, destroy the remaining demon experiment facilities at the Errzze Oratorium.
You have destroyed all experiment facilities. Go and talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
A Monk's Last Mission
Talk to Monk Abels
Monk Abels' condition is visibly deteriorated. Talk to Monk Abels.
Retrieve Holy Relic Fragments at Gaile Chapel
Monk Abels cannot turn a blind eye to the damage the demons have done. Go to Gaile Chapel and retrieve the holy relic fragments needed to purify the monastery.
Deliver to Monk Abels
You have collected as many holy relic fragments as possible. Bring them to Monk Abels.
Monk Abels' condition is worsening. Listen to what Abels has to say.
Prepare the relic for purifying the monastery
Monk Abels put his last efforts into restoring the holy relic. Use the relic to purify different locations in the monastery.
Report to Monk Abels
You have completed the purifying process. Go and look after Monk Abels in his last moments.
Rescue Rose
Follow Edmundas Into the Novaha Institute to rescue Rose
Edmundas ran inside the Novaha Institute to save Rose, asking you to help rescue her. To help Edmundas save Rose, follow him inside the institute and talk to him.
Find Black Materials to overload the device

Edmundas wants to try and overload the device, but he is not sure what to use for that. For now, try and defeat Brown Hummingbirds and collect any black objects you can obtain, then bring them to Edmundas.
The black substance the wizard used on the device was Brown Hummingbird mucus. Talk to Edmundas again.
Collect Brown Hummingbird Mucus
To bring Rose back to safety you need to overload the device and destroy it. Collect as much Brown Hummingbird mucus as you can.
Deliver to Edmundas
You have collected enough Brown Hummingbird Mucus. Bring it back to Edmundas.
Defeat Brown Hummingbirds to acquire mucus
Talk to Edmundas in the Main Hall Atrium
Edmundas says the next device is in the Main Hall Atrium. Follow Edmundas into the Main Hall Atrium.
Destroy the Mind Control Crystals
Rose could be under the influence of the Mind Control Crystals. Obtain the protective barrier from the device inside the Main Hall Atrium and destroy the crystal.
You have destroyed all Mind Control Crystals. Talk to Edmundas.
Talk to Edmundas nearby the Medie State Apartments
Edmundas took a lift to the Medie State Apartments. Follow Edmundas.
Rescue Rose at the Kilnuma Oratorium
The wizard wants to use Rose to spread out the giant bracken spores. Thwart the wizard's plans and rescue Rose at the Kilnuma Oratorium!
You rescued Rose and brought her back to safety. Ask Rose if she is alright.
Edmundas' Worry
It looks like Edmundas wants to ask you a favor. Talk to Edmundas.
Defeat monsters at the Medie State Apartments
Edmundas is not fully recovered yet, and the monsters are worrying him. Defeat the monsters at Medie State Apartments for Edmundas and Rose.
Report to Edmundas
You have defeated the monsters at the Medie State Apartments. Tell Edmundas they will be safe for a while now.
The monsters might be gone, but Edmundas is still worried about the demons. Talk to Edmundas.
Relay the situation to Orsha's Wizard Submaster
According to Edmundas, the Wizard Submaster in Orsha owes him a favor and might be able to help them. Go see the Wizard Submaster in Orsha and explain what happened to Edmundas and Rose.
The Wizard Submaster feels sorry about what happened to the siblings. Ask the Wizard Submaster for a way to stop the demons.
Craft a Protection Barrier Crystal
The Wizard Submaster gave you a recipe for a Protection Barrier Crystal. Defeat Deadborn Scaps at the Novaha Institute to obtain their demon essences,
then press the key to enter Rest Mode and craft a Protection Barrier Crystal.
Place the Protection Barrier Crystal
The Protection Barrier Crystal is completed. Go back to Edmundas and place the crystal.
Craft a %s
Edmundas and Rose will now be protected from demon attacks. Tell Edmundas about this.
It looks like Traveling Merchant Rose has a final favor to ask of you. Talk to Rose.
Remove the power sources of the Giant Bracken Spore Breeding Device in Sotras Chapel
Remove the power sources of the giant bracken spore breeding device inside Sotras Chapel. To keep the power sources from reactivating, you will have to remove them in the correct order.
You have deactivated the spore breeding device. Tell Traveling Merchant Rose about it.
Listen to Rose's detailed testimony
Traveling Merchant Rose believes she was able to read part of the wizard's mind when she was under mind contol. Listen to her testimony.
Rose seems devastated after hearing from Tess that her brother was taken to a different location. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
Rose is back to her senses after hearing your words of comfort. Talk to Rose about what to do next.
Member Grazina feels at risk and wants you to deliver the objects hidden in the Astral Tower. Deliver Grazina's objects to Member Irmantas.
Member Grazina needs you to find Member Alina. She says she saw her running South past Member Irmantas; head downwards and find Member Alina.
Tell Member Irmantas about the death of Member Alina and her objects.
Demon Lord Hauberk needs his servants to help him defeat the demons chasing after him. To help Hauberk call his servants, disable the monsters and let Hauberk absorb them.
Defeat Drapeliun
Demon Lord Hauberk thinks it's time to defeat Drapeliun. He hopes to drag Drapeliun out of the suspicious device in the Fiskavi Plains and defeat it with your help.
You have defeated Drapeliun. Talk to Demon Lord Hauberk.
Collect %s by defeating monsters at Apgaudin Crossroads
Collect Mochia Stems at Mochia Fields

Gailus Legwyn's spirit says the Kartas Hunter is encapsuled inside the Blessing Crystal, which means unless the demon is defeated, there is no way to get back the crystal. Collect some Mochia Stems at Mochia Fields in order to summon the vassals of the Legwyn family against the hunter.
You have collected enough Mochia Stems. Bring them to Gailus Legwyn's spirit.
The Journey Begins
What a horrific dream. But it's time to head to Orsha. Talk to Settler Bowein by the Lemprasa Pond.
Press the M key to view the map to find Settler Brophen.
Press the M key to open the map. Confirm Settler Brophen's location, then go and talk to him.
Defeat the swarm of Kepas
You have protected Settler Brophen from the Kepas' attack. Talk to Settler Brophen.
Use a Status Point
Brophen says you can use Status Points by leveling up to become even stronger. Press the F1 key and distribute your new Status Point.
You feel stronger now after using the Status Point. Talk to Settler Brophen again.
Settler Brophen taught you how to use Status Points. Talk to Settler Brophen again and find out what to do next.
Deliver Grass Leaf Ointment to Settler Layla

Settler Brophen says Settler Layla might know where the mayor is. He also asked you to deliver some grass leaf ointment to her. On your way to the Temporary Settler Camp, go see Layla and give her the grass leaf ointment.
Settler Layla says Mayor Romanas is headed to the Temporary Settler Camp. Go and talk to Mayor Romanas.
Mayor Romanas believes in your talent and will make sure you're admitted into Orsha immediately. Officer Lutas is looking for you; go find him at the Orsha Migration Office.
Officer Lutas is processing the settlers' entrance into Orsha but the task feels endless. Talk to Officer Lutas again.
A Poata suddenly appeared at the entrance to Orsha and it's threatening the settlers! Defeat the Poata and make the entrance to Orsha safe again.
You have defeated the Poata. Talk to Officer Lutas again.
Defeat the Poata attacking Orsha's Migration Office
You have defeated the Poata. Talk to Officer Lutas again.
Your entrance formalities have been processed. You can visit Orsha now.
Talk to Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha
Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha, is looking for someone with skills. To find Urbonas, the bishop of Orsha, talk to Inesa Hamondale at the Central Plaza first.
Settler Izna is looking fixedly at you. Talk to Settler Izna.
Defeat Leaf Bugs to obtain Red Leaves
Settler Izna wants to make some medicine for you as a token of appreciation. Defeat some Leaf Bugs around Ziedo Pond to obtain Red Leaves for the medicine.
Deliver the Red Leaves to Settler Izna
You have collected enough Red Leaves as requested by Settler Izna. Bring them to her.
Defeat Leaf Bugs to obtain %s
Settler Izna seems to have a request for you. Talk to Settler Izna.
Defeat Chinencys to obtain Rampar Mucus
Settler Izna wants to make Stamina Pills for the new settlers arriving to Orsha. Defeat Chinencys around Ziedo Pond and collect the Rampar Mucus used to make Stamina pills.
Deliver the Rampar Mucus to Settler Izna
You have collected enough Rampar Mucus as requested by Settler Izna. Bring it to her.
Defeat Chinencys to obtain %s
Settler Izna seems to be deeply worried about something. Talk to Settler Izna.
Make a bonfire on Adata Highway
Settler Izna believes some village residents have gotten lost on their way to Orsha. Go to Adata Highway and make a bonfire so they can spot the smoke and find their way.
Report to Settler Izna
You successfully made a bonfire. Go and tell Settler Izna.
The bonfire may be set, but Settler Izna is still worried about something. Talk to Settler Izna again.
Set fire to the firewood on Adata Highway
Settler Izna thinks the bonfire may be hard to spot by the residents. Go to Adata Highway and set fire to the firewood there.
You successfully defeated the Woodspirit. Go back to Settler Izna.
Settler Ivanayus seems to be struggling with something. Go and talk to Settler Ivanayus.
Collect Useful Object
Settler Ivanayus is in desperate need of supplies and willing to settle for used ones. Go to the Lumberjack Cabin and collect useful objects.
Deliver the useful objects to Settler Ivanayus
You have collected enough useful objects. Bring them to Settler Ivanayus.
Settler Dallanas is giving you a quizzical look. Talk to Settler Dallanas.
Worship the Statue of Goddess Zemyna at the Randoluma Rest Place
Settler Dallanas says the goddesses bless those who worship their statues. Worship the Statue of Goddess Zemyna at the Randoluma Rest Place and receive Her blessings.
Settler Dallanas seems worried about something. Talk to Settler Dallanas.
Defeat Monsters at the Randoluma Rest Place

Settler Dallanas was told to wait at the Randoluma Rest Place before coming to Orsha, but staying there proved impossible due to the amount of monsters. Go to the Randoluma Rest Place and defeat the monsters there.
The Randoluma Rest Place is safer now. Go and tell Settler Dallanas.
Settler Dallanas seems anxious about something. Ask them what is wrong.
Randoluma Rest Place
Settler Dallanas says her people arrived at the Randoluma Rest Place but had to scatter because of the monsters. Go to Randoluma Rest Place and find the villagers hiding there.
You have found the villagers and brought them back to safety. Tell Settler Dallanas.
The Lord of Orsha, Inesa Hamondale, wants you to hear about what is happening in Orsha before you start your journey. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about the situation in Orsha.
Inesa Hamondale has asked you to find the bishop of Orsha, Urbonas, who is missing. Talk to Inesa Hamondale again.
Inesa Hamondale seems to have something prepared for you before you set out to find Bishop Urbonas. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about it.
Worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza
Before you leave, Inesa Hamondale has asked you to worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza.
Visit the Item Merchant in the Shopping District
Inesa Hamondale has prepared a little gift for you. Go see the Item Merchant in the Shopping District.
It seems the Item Merchant has something else to ask you. Talk to the Item Merchant again.
Visit the Accessory Merchant
It seeems Inesa Hamondale has asked the Accessory Merchant to prepare another gift for you. Go find the Accessory Merchant in the Shopping District.
The Item Merchant says Inesa Hamondale is looking for you. Return to Inesa Hamondale.
Talk to Agent Cherasia at the Woods of the Linked Bridges
News just came in from Agent Cherasia, who is searching for the missing bishop. Go find the agent in the Woods of the Linked Bridges.
Collect Priest Irma's Journal Pages
Agent Cherasia seems to have found part of Priest Irma's journal while looking for the missing bishop. Try and recover the rest of the journal from monsters nearby.
Deliver to Agent Cherasia
You have collected as much of the journal as possible. Deliver it to Agent Cherasia.
Collect %s from monsters nearby
Agent Cherasia seems to have found some revealing contents in Priest Irma's journal. Take the journal to Moren.
Help Agent Moren
Protect Agent Moren while he investigates. The more monsters you defeat in the area, the faster the agent will finish his investigation.
Agent Moren's investigation is now complete. Ask him whether he has found anything.
Agent Moren seems to be pondering something. Keep talking to him.
Collect clues from the Smoking Piles of Grass
Agent Moren is convinced there might be other clues around. Look for leads in piles of grass with smoke coming out.
Deliver to Agent Moren
You have collected a good amount of clues. Bring them to Agent Moren.
Imminent Danger
Agent Moren thinks Priest Pranas might know something about the clues found here. Chaser Ulysses and Priest Pranas are traveling upwards; go and meet them.
Investigate the Greate Stone Face Hill
Priest Pranas instructed Chaser Ulysses to investigate, but he finds it difficult because of the monsters. Go and investigate the Greate Stone Face Hill for them.
Read the Unknown Diary
An unknown diary was found in the tent destroyed by the Minotaur. Read what it says.
Deliver to Chaser Ulysses
The diary belongs to the missing Bishop Urbonas. Bring the diary to Chaser Ulysses.
Talk to Chaser Talbasi at Paupys Crossing
Chaser Ulysses seems extremely worried about the demons. He wants you to go to Paupys Crossing immediately and find Chaser Talbasi, who is helping Priest Pranas.

Chaser Ulysses is worried about the demons and thinks it's best for you to go and help Priest Pranas instead. Go to Paupys Crossing and talk to Chaser Talbasi, who is there investigating with Priest Pranas.{nl}
Agent Pierneef looks extremely worn out. Try and talk to Agent Pierneef.
Defeat the monsters at the Zbuka Inner Court
Agent Pierneef is helping other agents investigate the area. Defeat some monsters at the Zbuka Inner Court.
Report to Agent Pierneef
The area seems safer now. Report back to Agent Pierneef.
A nauseating smell permeates the air all around. Ask Agent Pierneef about it.
Agent Pierneef says the smell of defeated monsters is making other monsters go wild. Go to the Zbuka Inner Court and eliminate the smelly cart there.
You have burned down the smelly cart. Go and tell Agent Pierneef.
Chaser Germeja is happy to see you. Talk to Chaser Germeja.
Use the stimulant on the monsters
Chaser Germeja wants to give the monsters a stimulant drug that makes them fight each other. Use the stimulant on monsters.
The stimulant works perfectly. Go and talk to Chaser Germeja again.
Chaser Raitis looks worryingly livid. Ask Chaser Raitis if there is a problem.
Defeat the monsters at Bonan Forest Road
Chaser Raitis says they saw an unknown monster making a nest at Bonan Forest Road. Go destroy the nest and defeat some monsters there.
Destroy the Monster Nest in Bonan Forest Road
You have defeated the monsters in Bonan Forest Road. Keep going and destroy the unknown monster nest.
Report to Chaser Raitis
You have successfully destroyed the nest. Go and tell Chaser Raitis.

Chaser Ulysses is worried about the demons and thinks it's best for you to go and help Priest Pranas instead. Go to Paupys Crossing and talk to Chaser Talbasi, who is there investigating with Priest Pranas.

Chaser Talbasi believes they can figure out what is going on once all of Priest Gelija's notes are collected. Defeat monsters at the Uninhabited Crossing and try to collect all of Priest Gelija's memos.
Deliver to Chaser Talbasi
You have collected Priest Gelija's notes as much as possible. Return to Chaser Talbasi.
Collect Priest Gelija's Memos
You now have Priest Gelija's notes, but an important part seems to have been torn off. Ask Chaser Talbasi about what to do next.
Search the Paslaptis Hideout
Chaser Talbasi believes it's best to obtain more concrete clues before finding Priest Pranas. They asked you to search the recently discovered Paslaptis Hideout before meeting up with Agent Larena.
There was nothing but traces of hurried movements at the Paslaptis Hideout. To continue investigating, go talk to Agent Larena under the Watchtower.
Find the priests' traces with Jolly

Agent Larena believes Bishop Urbonas and the priests are on the move not because of a simple threat, but with a specific purpose. Take Jolly, a dog raised by the priests, and try to find their traces nearby.
Thanks to Jolly you were able to find traces of the priests. Go and talk to Larena again.
Agent Larena seems to have hear something. Ask Agent Larena what happened.
Chaser Sendal looks gravely injured. Talk to Chaser Sendal and find out what happened.
Chaser Sendal was waiting for help. Talk to Chaser Sendal and find out what happened.
Rescue Priest Pranas from the demons at Groundsle Hill
Chaser Sendal and Priest Pranas encountered some demons while investigating Groundsle Hill. Chaser Sendal now wants you to help rescue Priest Pranas from the demons.
You finally rescued Priest Pranas. Ask Priest Pranas if he is alright.
Priest Pranas' condition seems to have worsened drastically. Keep talking to Priest Pranas.
Priest Pranas has asked you to find traces of Bishop Urbonas and return to Orsha. Search Groundsle Hill for any leads on Bishop Urbonas.
Talk to Priest Pranas in Orsha
You discovered a locked box. Go see Priest Pranas, who is receiving treatment in Orsha.
Agent Orwen seems to need your help. Talk to Agent Orwen.
Agent Orwen wants you to defeat the monsters disturbing the agents' operations at the Naudingas Felled Area.
Report to Agent Orwen
You have cleared out the monsters nearby. Report to Agent Orwen.
Agent Orwen seems worried about the sudden horde of demons. Talk to Agent Orwen.
Remove the Ominous Magic Circles
Agent Orwen says the demons have created a series of unknown magic circles. Remove the magic circles created by the demons at the Naudingas Felled Area.
You have eliminated all visible magic circles. Go back and tell Agent Orwen.
Agent Notres looks furious. Ask Agent Notres what is wrong.
Defeat the monsters at the Deer Hooves Lot
Agent Notres thinks it doesn't make sense to move the people migrating to Orsha to the Deer Hooves Lot. First, they want you to check whether it would be possible to defeat the monsters there.
Check out at the Deer Hooves Lot
Agent Notres has asked you to check whether the Deer Hooves Lot can be used to make a temporary settler camp. Go there and see whether it is safe.
The Deer Hooves Lot doesn't seem like a safe place for the settlers. Go and tell Agent Notres about it.
Agent Notres seems to need your help. Talk to Agent Notres.

Agent Notres was sent to collect blood from monsters in order to find out what is making them so ferocious, but it's not an easy task. Defeat some monsters at Rohonsa Cliff and help collect their contaminated blood.
Deliver to Agent Notres
You have collected enough contaminated blood. Bring it to Agent Notres.
Chaser Zegaus needs your help. Talk to Chaser Zegaus.
While Chaser Zegaus is glad Priest Pranas is safe, now they are injured and worried for their own safety. Defeat some monsters for Zegaus.
The monsters won't be a threat now. Return to Chaser Zegaus.
Chaser Zegaus looks troubled by something. Ask Chaser Zegaus what is wrong.
Collect Chaser Zegaus' Belongings
Chaser Zegaus seems to have lost a bag with medicine and bandages. Look around and search for the trackers' belongings.
Deliver to Chaser Zegaus
You have found the trackers' belongings. Bring them to Chaser Zegaus.
The box you found at Groundsle Hill that seems to belong to Bishop Urbonas. Talk to Priest Pranas about the box's contents.
Relay the journal's contents to Inesa Hamondale
Most of the contents of Bishop Urbonas' journal remain unknown. For now, relay the journal as it is to Inesa Hamondale.
Inesa Hamondale is deeply worried after hearing about Bishop Urbonas being chased by demons. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about what to do next.
Inesa Hamondale prepared a quick gift that will be useful for your journey. Before departing for Ashaq Underground Prison, visit the Item Merchant to collect it.
If you are ready, go join Priest Pranas before leaving for the Ashaq Underground Prison to rescue Bishop Urbonas.
Join Priest Pranas
Priest Pranas says he is going to gather a few talented Chasers and head to the entrance of Ashaq Underground Prison. Join him by the Gebene Cliff in Paupys Crossing.
Bishop Urbonas' Whereabouts
You have now met with Priest Pranas at the entrance to the Ashaq Underground Prison. Ask him whether he is ready to go inside the prison.
Priest Pranas says he will enter Ashaq Underground Prison 1F first with the Chasers. Follow Priest Pranas to Ashaq Underground Prison 1F.
There seems to be something wrong with Priest Pranas and the Chasers. Ask Priest Pranas about what happened.
Priest Pranas is having difficulties moving due to an odd energy felt in the area. Talk to Priest Pranas again.
Check the Torture Material Room
Priest Pranas says he feels as if his body is being constricted. He did say the sensation felt stronger inside the Torture Material Room; go there and investigate.
Defeat the incoming demons
The idol inside the Torture Material Room is making the demons attack!
Report to Priest Pranas on the Cursed Idol
You have successfully defeated the attacking demons. Talk to Priest Pranas about the cursed idol.
Defeat the attacking demons
With the cursed idol destroyed, the curse on Ashaq Underground Prison 1F seems to have been lifted. Return to Priest Pranas.
Priest Pranas seems to be completely unaware of the cursed idol. Talk to Priest Pranas about what to do next.
Go to the location marked on the map left by Bishop Urbonas
Priest Pranas believes the map left behind by Bishop Urbonas is the only hope you have. Take the track under the stairs to the right side of Pranas to get to the location marked on the map.
Talk to Bishop Urbonas
Unexpectedly, Bishop Urbonas is standing on the spot marked on the map! Ask Bishop Urbonas about what happened.
Bishop Urbonas says he is hiding in the Ashaq Underground Prison to keep the Demon Orders from Marnox. Tell Bishop Urbonas about the nightmare.
Bishop Urbonas wonders if you're not a Revelator as the ones told in the legends yourself. Step on the Revelator magic circle to prove your identity as a Revelator.
A bright light twines around your body and you feel an inexplicable surge of divine force. Talk to Bishop Urbonas again.
Bishop Urbonas has asked you to retrieve the hidden Demon Orders. Talk to him again and find out what you need to do.
Defeat demons to recharge the Orb of Return
According to Urbonas, to destroyed the cursed idol you need to defeat demons in Ashaq Underground Prison 1F and recharge the Orb of Return, then use it on the cursed idol.
Destroy the Cursed Idol in the Torture Material Room
You have recharged the Orb of Return. Use it on the cursed idol to destroy it!
Defeat Blue Dumaros and Blue Wendigos to recharge the Orb of Return
Chaser Torvana fears the demons might attack because of the cursed idol. Talk to Chaser Torvana.
